column2: {PlayerSurName}, take care of yourself.
column3: {PlayerSurName} ดูแลตัวเองด้วย

column2: All newcomers to the stronghold must go through a test before they are qualified to work for the stronghold. You look too weak now, why bother to ask for trouble? Let's get your level up to <color=#c44b0e>15</color> first.
Sworn Brothers
column3: พี่น้องร่วมสาบาน

column2: I can only seek another way and find a new place to settle down.
With the promise of the big brother, I will feel more secure in doing things in the future.
column3: ด้วยคำสัญญาของพี่ใหญ่ ทำให้ข้ารู้สึกมั่นใจในการกระทำสิ่งต่างๆในภายภาคหน้า

column2: {PlayerSurName} brother, with your skills and means, it's really a waste to be in this Blue Wind Camp. If you don't mind, I, old Kong, want to become inseparable brothers with you. What do you think?
column3: น้อง{PlayerSurName} ด้วยทักษะและความสามารถของเจ้า มันช่างน่าเสียดายจริงๆหากจะต้องอยู่ในค่ายวายุครามแห่งนี้ ถ้าเจ้าไม่รังเกียจ ข้าพี่ใหญ่ขง อยากสาบานเป็นพี่น้องกับเจ้า เจ้าคิดเห็นว่าอย่างไร?

column2: (The big boss is sincere, how should I respond?)
column3: (หัวหน้าใหญ่จริงจังกับเรื่องนี้ ข้าจะตอบอย่างไรดี?)

column2: Agree to become sworn brothers with the big boss.
column3: ตกลงสาบานเป็นพี่น้องกับหัวหน้าใหญ่

column2: Politely decline the big boss's kindness.
column3: ปฏิเสธน้ำใจของหัวหน้าใหญ่อย่างสุภาพ

column2: Haha, it's okay, it's me, old Kong, who was too abrupt. What I said is always valid. Whenever you want to recognize me, old Kong, as your big brother, you can find me anytime.
{PlayerSurName} brother, how do you consider the matter of becoming sworn brothers?
column3: น้อง{PlayerSurName} เจ้าคิดอย่างไรเกี่ยวกับการสาบานเป็นพี่น้อง?

column2: Hahaha, it's better to choose a day than hit the day. How about we become inseparable brothers under the witness of all the brothers in this Righteous Hall today?
column3: ฮ่าฮ่าฮ่า, เลือกวันได้ดี แล้ววันนี้เราจะกลายเป็นพี่น้องร่วมสาบานภายใต้สักขีพยานของพี่น้องทุกคนในหอคุณธรรมนี้ได้อย่างไร

column2: It's all up to the big boss.
column3: ทุกอย่างขึ้นอยู่กับท่านหัวหน้าใหญ่

column2: I, Kong Yidao!
column3: ข้า ขงอี้เตา!

column2: {PlayerName}。
column3: {PlayerName}

column2: Become inseparable brothers today
column3: วันนี้ขอสาบานเป็นพี่น้อง

column2: Not seeking to be born in the same year, same month
column3: แม้มิได้เกิดเดือนเดียวปีเดียวกัน

column2: But seeking to die in the same year, same month
column3: แต่จะขอตายเดือนเดียวปีเดียวกัน

column2: If there is any violation...
column3: หากมีการฝ่าฝืนใดๆ...

column2: Listen up, you thieves of Blue Wind Camp!
column3: เหล่าโจรแห่งค่ายวายุครามจงฟัง!

column2: You harm the people and are full of evil! Today, I am here on the orders of the pacification commissioner to flatten your stronghold!
It's that guy with the surname Lu who is causing trouble again, even messing up the good things between me and {PlayerSurName} brother, he is simply intolerable!
{PlayerSurName} brother, come with me to see how many guts they have to come to Blue Wind Camp and talk big!
Go back and tell your master that if he wants to exchange the lives of my brothers in Blue Wind Camp for his own bright future, I absolutely refuse!
Big brother, rest assured, we swear to live and die with Blue Wind Camp!
Good brother, I've had enough in this life!
column3: พี่น้องที่ดี ชีวิตนี้ข้าพึงพอใจแล้ว!

column2: {yell}<size=150%>Cut the grass and remove the roots\nLeave no one!</size>
This time, our Swallow Nest really picked up a treasure. I didn't expect you to be so proficient in the way of stealing. The future growth of Swallow Nest depends on you!
You new disciples who have just joined the Swallow Nest are still too weak and haven't shown any outstanding character. Come find me when you reach <color=#c44b0e>level 15</color>.
During this time, you can go to the <color=#c44b0e>practice disciples</color> of our sect to learn and improve your strength as soon as possible.
Practice Steal Skill to level 2 with Kong Kong in Swallow Nest.

Your stealing skills are not yet proficient. Go to the sleeping area inside and practice your stealing skills with <color=#c44b0e>Kong Kong</color>. Come find me when your Steal Skill is upgraded to level 2.
There is always a vague sense of unease in my heart. Is it my illusion? \nShould I continue to go inside, or run away now...
Continue forward (intense combat)
Temporarily run away from Swallow Nest

I didn't expect that Qianxue has recruited a master who is good at Immobilize for the Crime Investigation Bureau this time. It really proves that appearances can be deceiving. With your help, the Crime Investigation Bureau will surely be more efficient in handling cases in the future.
Your current strength is too weak, there is no possibility of passing the entry-level assessment that is about to be conducted on you. Come back to me when you reach <color=#c44b0e>level 20</color>.
column3: ความแข็งแกร่งในปัจจุบันของเจ้าอ่อนแอเกินไป มีความเป็นไปได้ที่จะไม่ผ่านการประเมินระดับเริ่มต้น กลับมาหาข้าเมื่อเจ้าไปถึง <color = #c44b0e> ระดับ 20</color>

column2: During this time, you can spar with the <color=#c44b0e>practice constable</color> of our bureau to quickly improve your own strength.
column3: ในช่วงเวลานี้เจ้าสามารถฝึกฝนกับ<color =#c44b0e>ครูฝึก</color> ของสํานักของเราเพื่อปรับปรุงความแข็งแกร่งของเจ้าเองได้อย่างรวดเร็ว

column2: Crisis
column3: วิกฤติ

column2: {PlayerName}, we are now facing a crisis that could lead to the destruction of the Crime Investigation Bureau at any time, and I want to know your attitude at this moment.
column3: {PlayerName} ขณะนี้เรากำลังเผชิญกับวิกฤตที่อาจนำไปสู่การทำลายล้างสำนักงานสืบสวนได้ทุกเมื่อ และข้าต้องการทราบทัศนคติของเจ้าในขณะนี้

column2: A crisis that could lead to the destruction of the Crime Investigation Bureau at any time...\nMy attitude...
column3: วิกฤติที่อาจนำไปสู่การทำลายล้างสำนักงานสืบสวนได้ทุกเมื่อ...\nทัศนคติของข้า...

column2: Stand or fall with the Crime Investigation Bureau! (High-intensity battle)
column3: อยู่และตายไปกับสำนักงานสืบสวน! (เข้าสู่การต่อสู้ที่มีความเข้มข้นสูง)

column2: Let me think about it
column3: ให้ข้าคิดดูก่อน

column2: Good, I knew I didn't misjudge you!\nNext, let's welcome our distinguished guest together.
column3: ดี ข้ารู้ว่าข้าไม่ได้ตัดสินเจ้าผิด!\nต่อไปก็มาร่วมต้อนรับแขกผู้มีเกียรติด้วยกัน

column2: The Langya Sword Pavilion has a rule that new disciples must pass the test arranged by the old man to truly become a disciple of the Sword Pavilion. Your current strength is too weak, wait until you reach <color=#c44b0e>level 25</color> to talk.
During this time, you can spar with the <color=#c44b0e>practice disciple</color> of our pavilion to quickly improve your own level.
Suspicious
column3: น่าสงสัย

column2: Come back to Jian Chi for a task when you reach level 35.
You can now go to Jian Chi to accept the task of investigating suspicious people.

Recently, there have been suspicious individuals lurking around this pavilion. I originally planned to assign you to investigate this matter. However, your skills are too weak to undertake this task. Let's wait until your strength improves further.
Choose one of these two manuals as the martial arts gift from the old Taoist.\nIf it doesn't match the direction of your martial arts, don't force it, you can also give it to your partner to learn.
Granny, what is this?
Hahahaha
column3: ฮ่าฮ่าฮ่าฮ่า

column2: Strange, it seems to smell an unusual scent.
{yell}{PlayerName}, hold your breath!
There's poison in this incense...
Kid, no matter how cunning you are, you can't escape my calculations.
This voice sounds so familiar...
column3: น้ำเสียงนี้ฟังดูคุ้นมาก...

column2: It's you! Weren't you already...
Hehe!
Disguise, faking death... You guys really have deep plans.
What can you do now that you know?
I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
I have already delivered food to the Refugee Camp today. I'll deliver more tomorrow.
The Refugee Camp outside the city is short of food. We need to arrange for people to go into the city to buy food and deliver it to the people of the Refugee Camp to alleviate their urgent needs.
Rob the rich
Have intercepted merchant teams near the Blue Wind Camp {TagNum:清风寨劫富} times.
I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
We can't do this kind of business too often. We need to take it slow, otherwise who would dare to pass by here in the future.
A wealthy man who is unkind to the poor is passing by with money he has swindled. It is said that the bodyguards he hired are weak and easy to defeat. Interested brothers can go and check it out.
column3: มีเศรษฐีผู้ร่ำรวยแต่ใจดำกำลังขนเงินที่ไปโกงชาวบ้าน ผ่านมาใกล้ๆนี้พอดี ข่าวลือบอกว่ายามที่เขาจ้างไว้มีฝีมือต่ำต้อย ไม่น่าจะต้านทานเจ้าได้เกิน 3 กระบวนท่า หากพี่น้องสนใจก็ลองไปดูได้

column2: This time the information is accurate. The wealthy man who escaped by luck before has appeared nearby again. It is said that the bodyguards he hired are highly skilled and numerous. Brothers who are confident in their own abilities can go and check it out.
Eliminate evil
column3: ขจัดความชั่วร้าย

column2: Have cleared {TagNum:清风寨杀官} corrupt officials near the Blue Wind Camp.
I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
Today's task has been completed. Dealing with these corrupt officials is not an overnight job, there's no need to rush.

A heinous corrupt official passed by nearby, and it was learned that several officials were accompanying him. Brothers, please take this opportunity to get rid of him as soon as possible, acting for the heavens!
column3: มีกังฉินผู้ชั่วร้ายผ่านมาใกล้ๆ ตามข่าวบอกว่ามีทหารติดตามมาด้วย พวกท่านจงใช้โอกาสอันดีนี้กำจัดพวกมันเสียโดยเร็ว ถือซะว่าลงโทษแทนฟ้าดิน!

column2: A heinous corrupt official passed by nearby, and it was learned that several martial arts superb officials were accompanying him. Brothers, please take this opportunity to get rid of him as soon as possible, acting for the heavens!
column3: มีกังฉินผู้ชั่วร้ายผ่านมาใกล้ๆ ตามข่าวบอกว่ามันผู้นี้มีจอมยุทธที่วรยุทธสูงส่งมากติดตามอยู่ พวกท่านจงใช้โอกาสอันดีนี้กำจัดพวกมันเสียโดยเร็ว ถือซะว่าลงโทษแทนฟ้าดิน!

column2: Rescue
column3: ช่วยเหลือ

column2: Have rescued {TagNum:清风寨救人} henchmen of the Blue Wind Camp from the Chuxiang City Prison.
Failed to rescue the henchmen of the Blue Wind Camp from the Chuxiang City Prison {TagNum:清风寨救人失败} times.
I wonder if the head of the Blue Wind Camp has any new arrangements today.
There are no brothers who need to be rescued for the time being.\nI hope our brothers won't get into trouble and get caught by the government in the future.
This matter is against the government and has a significant impact. I don't want to involve more people, so you should not participate in this for now.
It seems that the leader still treats me as an outsider.

A brother from the mountain stronghold was caught by the officials and is now imprisoned in the Chuxiang City Government Office Prison. If we don't rush to rescue him, I'm afraid this brother will be in great danger.
column3: พี่ชายคนหนึ่งจากฐานที่มั่นบนภูเขาถูกเจ้าหน้าที่จับได้ และตอนนี้กำลังถูกขังคุกอยู่ในเรือนจำศาลาว่าการเมืองฉู่เซียง ถ้าเราไม่รีบไปช่วยเขา ข้าเกรงว่าพี่ชายคนนี้จะตกอยู่ในอันตรายใหญ่หลวง

column2: There are still jailers in the Prison. If caught again, it would be a capital crime. I don't want to take that risk.
Great, you're here to cover my retreat. I'll go first to avoid being caught by those bailiffs again.
(Looking very ill)
(Seemingly in great pain)
(Sweat beads continuously dripping from his forehead)
Brother Kong, what's wrong with you? You look very uncomfortable.
Boss, what's wrong with you? You look very uncomfortable.
Alas, it's embarrassing to say...
column3: อา.. มันน่าอายที่จะพูดออกไป...

column2: I used to live on the edge every day, often licking blood off the blade. External injuries are not a big deal, but multiple Internal Injuries have not healed to this day, causing occasional bouts of pain.
Ordinary doctors are helpless with this. I'm afraid only a highly skilled national doctor in Medical can cure my Old illness.
Leave it to me. I'll find those highly skilled doctors in Medical to treat your injuries.
Have you found a doctor who can Heal my Old illness?
There's no progress yet, but I'll do my best.

column2: Go to Crime Investigation Bureau Prison to rescue the disciples of Swallow Nest.

column2: But with your reckless actions, we will eventually find the Swallow Nest's lair and capture you all! Today, let's start with you little shrimps!
column3: แต่ด้วยการกระทำบ้าบิ่นของเจ้า เราก็จะสืบหาแหล่งกบดานของไอ้พวกรังนกนางแอ่นแล้วจับพวกเจ้าให้หมดเลย! วันนี้เริ่มจากปลาซิวอย่างพวกแกทั้งสองตัวก่อนเลย!

column2: The head catcher just said that they will eventually find the location of Swallow Nest. Could it be that Swallow Nest has been too ostentatious recently?

A brother from our sect was unfortunately captured by the Official and is now imprisoned in Daliang City Government Office Prison. If not rescued soon, he may not be able to withstand the torture and reveal the location of our sect.
column3: โชคไม่ดีที่พี่ชายจากพรรคของเราถูกทางการจับตัวไป และตอนนี้ถูกจำคุกในเรือนจำที่ศาลาว่าการเมืองต้าเหลียง หากไม่ได้รับการช่วยเหลือในเร็ว ๆ นี้, เขาอาจจะไม่สามารถทนต่อการทรมานและเปิดเผยที่ตั้งของพรรคของเราได้

column2: Thank you, brother, for your Righteous rescue. The crisis is now over. I'll go first, we'll meet again.

column2: A brother from our sect was unfortunately captured by the Crime Investigation Bureau and is now imprisoned in Crime Investigation Bureau Prison. Brothers, please hurry to the rescue!
Brother, you have suffered, I will rescue you.
column3: พี่น้องเจ้าทรมาณมากสินะ ข้ามาช่วยเจ้าแล้ว

column2: It's so dangerous here, why did you come?\nYou should Run away quickly, don't worry about me, we can't all fall here!
column3: มันอันตรายมาก เจ้าเข้ามาได้ยังไงกัน?\nเจ้าควรรีบหนีไป ไม่ต้องห่วงข้า เราจะมาตายที่นี่กันหมดไม่ได้

column2: Stop talking nonsense, hurry up and Run away with me!
column3: หยุดพูดเรื่องไร้สาระแล้วออกไปจากที่นี่กับข้า!

column2: Since you're here, why rush to Run away?
You thieves from Swallow Nest, you're really like rats in the sewer, popping up one after another to annoy people!
I reckon it won't be long before we find the Swallow Nest's lair and wipe you all out! Today, let's start with you little mice!
Thank you, brother, for your Righteous rescue. The crisis is now over. I'll go first, we'll meet again.

column2: It's a pity that we couldn't save this brother, this mission is considered a failure.

column2: Patrol

column2: You have participated in {TagNum:神捕门巡逻} Crime Investigation Bureau patrols.
I wonder if Chief Luo has any new arrangements today.
Those who dared to offend the Crime Investigation Bureau have been mostly dealt with, at least today should be more peaceful.
Recently received a secret report, there are villains coming to Crime Investigation Bureau to break the prison. We urgently need more hands for the night patrol of our prison, to be prepared!
City Patrol
You have participated in {TagNum:神捕门巡城} Daliang City patrols.
I wonder if Chief Luo has any new arrangements today.
There won't be any more thieves sneaking into Daliang City today, you can rest now.
Thieves often appear in Daliang City at midnight, the Crime Investigation Bureau is commissioned to patrol the city at night and catch the thieves as soon as possible.
column3: โจรมักจะปรากฏตัวในเมืองต้าเหลียงในเวลาเที่ยงคืน สำนักงานสืบสวนอาชญากรรมได้รับหน้าที่ให้ลาดตระเวนในเมืองในเวลากลางคืนและจับหัวขโมยโดยเร็วที่สุด

column2: You have participated in {TagNum:中州剿匪} operations to eliminate bandits in Zhongzhou Region.
I wonder if Sister Qianxue has any new arrangements today.
I haven't received any other news about bandits for now. When I do, I might need your help again.
Today we received news that bandits have appeared in Zhongzhou, committing all kinds of evil deeds. Unfortunately, I have other urgent tasks now, otherwise I would not stand by and do nothing.
Eliminate evil
column3: ขจัดความชั่วร้าย

column2: You have participated in {TagNum:中州剿匪2} operations to eliminate villains in Zhongzhou Region.
I wonder if Brother Qiu has any new arrangements today.
