column2: Damn, I don't know how uncle is doing!\n{PlayerName}, this is not the time to wander around, I'll go back to the water fortress first, you hurry up too!
Life is the most important thing. If you are a rich lady, you should help others. If you really do as he said, you are not a doctor at all.
You, you——!
Shura Master! I didn't expect you to be with King Chai.
What are these things?
Shura Master is the top master in this palace, and the other ten are the chess pieces I have placed everywhere. Each of them has a strength not weaker than a general sect leader.
You have raised so many masters, it seems that you have long planned to control both the martial arts world and the court!
Should I change into a different Outfit now...
Change into <color=#c44b0e>Ordinary Soldier</color> appearance
Change into <color=#c44b0e>Guerilla General</color> appearance
Change into <color=#c44b0e>Taoist Sect Disciple</color> appearance
Change into <color=#c44b0e>Confucius Temple Disciple</color> appearance
Change into <color=#c44b0e>Shifa Temple Disciple</color> appearance
Restore initial appearance.
Don't want to change.
Should I take a nap now?
Sleep for <color=#c44b0e>1 shichen</color>
column3: นอนหลับ <color=#c44b0e>1 ชั่วยาม</color>

column2: Sleep for <color=#c44b0e>3 shichen</color>
column3: นอนหลับ <color=#c44b0e>3 ชั่วยาม</color>

column2: Don't want to sleep yet
column3: ยังไม่อยากนอน

column2: Should I play the zither for a while?
Play the zither for <color=#c44b0e>1 shichen</color>
Play the zither for <color=#c44b0e>3 shichen</color>
Don't want to play the zither yet
Aftermath
Go to the General's mansion and seek justice from Lü Wenhuan.
{PlayerName}, you're still alive!
It seems that General Lü has long regarded me as a dead man...
It's indeed surprising that you could walk out of the court alive, but what surprises me more is that you dare to come to this General's mansion.
I have to find out who framed me for treason and who wanted to kill me.

This Chuxiang City is a gift from me to the Yan Kingdom. We are just one step away from allowing the Yan army to take control of the entire Chuxiang City without shedding a drop of blood. With this merit, I can become an Imperial Noble in Yan Kingdom, which is much better than being stuck in this Chuxiang City.
So you are the one who has been secretly communicating with Yan Kingdom and colluding with Wanyan Wuzhu!
Even if you know the truth, haven't you noticed that you are being avoided by everyone in Chuxiang City? Even if you tell them the truth, how many of them would believe you?
Is it because I ruined your plan that you want to frame me, ruin my reputation, and vent your anger?
Just ruining your reputation doesn't benefit me...
However, what if the people knew that I cleverly devised a plan, personally led the troops to defeat the Yan army, and timely discovered your treason, saving Chuxiang City from disaster?
{PlayerName}, thank you for giving me this rare opportunity to make my name known to the world. I will surely drink a few more cups in your memory on your death anniversary.
Finally showing your true colors?
If you were invincible, I would have sleepless nights.
It seems that the General's mansion is going to be wiped out today!
Dare to run wild in the General's mansion, {PlayerName}, you've chosen the wrong place!
{PlayerName}, even if I consider you as a brother, if you lay a hand on my father today, don't blame me for being rude!
You found a large amount of evidence of Lü Wenhuan's treason in the General's mansion and made it public. Justice is in the hearts of the people...
It seems that General Lü has long regarded me as a dead man...
It's indeed surprising that you could walk out of the court alive, but what surprises me more is that you dare to come to this General's mansion.
General Lü still owes me a big favor, I came specially to collect the debt.
Nonsense, what favor do I owe you!
Let me take the blame for your treason for no reason, how should this favor be calculated?
As a member of the General's mansion, using your insignificant life to achieve my supreme glory is your blessing from several lifetimes of cultivation.
If you can enter my Holy Fire Sect's main altar, you must have some abilities. Can you tell me your name, so that I, the sect leader, can know your name.
I am {PlayerName}.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, your fame is so great now, even I, the sect leader, have recognized you. I have always wanted to meet you, the rising star in the martial arts world.

My name is Fang Xiaoian, the sect leader. You may not have heard of me if you have been living in the Central Plains for a long time. However, in this vast Western Regions, I am a well-known local hero. If we talk about strength and cultivation, I am not much inferior to the leaders of the three religions in the Central Plains.
I, the sect leader, have always liked to make friends with heroes from all walks of life. Today, I am destined to know {PlayerSurName} young hero. These small things are our meeting gifts.
Thank you for your appreciation, Sect Leader.
{PlayerName}... I don't know when such a young hero appeared in the martial arts world of the Central Plains. I, the sect leader, am really ignorant.
I, the sect leader Fang Xiaoian, always like to make friends with heroes from all walks of life. Today, since I have known {PlayerSurName} young hero, I will do my best to be a good host.
Thank you for your appreciation, Sect Leader.
{PlayerName}, you are an enemy of the Holy Fire Sect, and you dare to appear in front of me, the sect leader. I admire your courage very much.
I, the sect leader Fang Xiaoian, although I like to make friends with heroes from all walks of life, I am ruthless to my enemies.
I, the sect leader, will spare you for your youth and recklessness, and will not argue with you. Hurry up and run away from the Holy Fire Sect, so as not to ask for trouble.
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask which one of the Holy Fire Sect you are?
I am Gu Qing Yang, the Azure Dragon Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect.
Since you are a friend of the Holy Fire Sect, I should treat you with courtesy.
Since you are an enemy of the Holy Fire Sect, the long sword in my hand is about to be unsheathed for you!
Humph, you have some skills.
Today is just a warning to you. If you continue to oppose the Holy Fire Sect, be careful not to be able to run away from the Western Regions alive.
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask how to address the hero?
column3: ข้ามีนามว่า {PlayerName} ไม่ทราบว่าท่านจอมยุทธมีนามว่ากระไร?

column2: I am Ren Zhongheng, the Black Tortoise Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect, and I pay my respects to the Deputy Sect Leader.
Humph, what about the Kirin Envoy? Isn't it still ranked behind me, Ren Zhongheng, the Black Tortoise Envoy?
Kid, I advise you to use your brain when dealing with people in the Holy Fire Sect. Don't offend people without knowing it.
Kid, don't try to get close to me!
I, Ren Zhongheng, am one of the Four Holy Envoys of the Holy Fire Sect, the Black Tortoise Envoy.\nIf you dare to play tricks in front of me, be careful that I smash you into a pulp with one stick!
I didn't expect to see such a beautiful woman in the Western Regions...
Is there anything unclean on my face that attracts the young hero's attention?
I am {PlayerName}, I was just lost in thought just now, and I was rude to the lady.
With the lady's appearance, she should not be a maid of the Holy Fire Sect. May I ask what position the lady holds in the Holy Fire Sect?
I am Feng Xuanji, the Vermilion Bird Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect, in charge of intelligence and news.
{PlayerSurName} Young hero comes from the Central Plains, with broad knowledge. Perhaps in the future, I will have to request more from {PlayerSurName} young hero.
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask how to address the hero?
column3: ข้ามีนามว่า {PlayerName} ไม่ทราบว่าท่านจอมยุทธมีนามว่ากระไร?

column2: I heard that you are the new deputy leader of the Holy Fire Sect?\nThe Holy Fire Sect is becoming more and more mixed, anyone can sit in the position of the deputy leader.
It seems that you are quite unhappy about me becoming the deputy leader of the Holy Fire Sect?
Humph, not everyone can become the deputy leader!\nLet me test the quality of your deputy leadership.
With your meager skills, you are actually worthy of Fang Xiaoian using the position of deputy leader to win you over. It seems that there are really no people left in the Holy Fire Sect.
You have a lot of prejudices against the Holy Fire Sect, who are you exactly?
Holy Fire Sect's White Tiger Envoy, Yan Luochong!
column3: ทูตพยัคฆ์ขาวแห่งนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ เยี่ยนหลัวจง!

column2: I didn't expect you to be the White Tiger Envoy!
However, as one of the Four Holy Envoys of the Holy Fire Sect, don't you lack the due respect for the deputy leader?
Even if Fang Xiaoian comes in person, my attitude is the same, let alone you.
Hmph, with your skills, Fang Xiaoian has found a treasure. No wonder he decisively granted you the position of Vice Sect Leader.
You seem to have a lot of prejudice against the Holy Fire Sect, and you don't seem to respect Sect Leader Fang Xiaoian. Could it be that you are an enemy of the Holy Fire Sect?
I am Yan Luochong, the White Tiger Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect!
column3: ข้าคือเยี่ยนหลัวจง ทูตพยัคฆ์ขาวแห่งนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์!

column2: I didn't expect you to be the White Tiger Envoy!
However, as one of the Four Holy Envoys of the Holy Fire Sect, why are you so dissatisfied with the sect?

The current Fang Xiaoian is no longer the ambitious and heroic person he used to be. Under his leadership, the Holy Fire Sect will only exhaust its military power and make enemies on all sides. In a few years, the Holy Fire Sect will find it difficult to gain a foothold in the Western Regions.
Such an arrogant and conceited person is no longer worth my continued following. If it weren't for a bit of sentiment, I would have left the Holy Fire Sect long ago.
I'm not interested in who you are.
column3: ข้าไม่สนใจว่าเจ้าเป็นใคร

column2: I see you're also a vagabond. Why not make friends?
column3: เราต่างเป็นชาวยุทธเช่นเดียวกัน ไยจึงไม่ทำความรู้จักกันหน่อยเล่า?

column2: I don't need friends.
column3: ข้าไม่ต้องการเพื่อน

column2: However...
column3: อย่างไรก็ตาม...

column2: I would like to ask you for a favor.
column3: ข้ามีเรื่องอยากจะขอร้องเจ้าหน่อย

column2: What can I do for you?
column3: เจ้าอยากให้ข้าช่วยอะไรไหม?

column2: Pass a message for me to a woman surnamed <color=#c44b0e>Phoenix</color> in the <color=#c44b0e>Sacred Fire Sect</color> of the Western Regions.
column3: นำสารจากข้าไปบอกสตรีสกุล <color=#c44b0e>เฟิงหวง</color> ใน<color=#c44b0e>นิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์</color> ที่แดนตะวันตก

column2: Tell her that Yan Luochong's promise to her is still valid to this day.
column3: บอกนางว่าคำสัญญาของเยี่ยนหลัวจงที่มีต่อนางยังคงมีผลจนถึงทุกวันนี้

column2: I'm curious, what promise did you make to the woman surnamed Feng back then?
column3: ข้าสงสัยนักว่าสัญญาอันใดที่ท่านไปสัญญาไว้กับแม่นางสกุลเฟิงหวงกัน?

column2: No comment.
column3: ข้าขอไม่ตอบ

column2: How can you be sure that I will go to the Western Regions to find the Holy Fire Sect in the future?
column3: เจ้าแน่ใจได้ยังไงว่าข้าจะเดินทางไปแดนตะวันตก เพื่อไปเยือนนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ในอนาคต?

column2: I can't be sure, but there's still a glimmer of hope.
column3: ข้าไม่แน่ใจ แต่อย่างน้อยก็พอมีโอกาสบ้าง

column2: You won't tell me who you are, yet you expect me to travel thousands of miles to the Western Regions to deliver a message for you?
column3: เจ้าไม่บอกว่าเจ้าเป็นใคร แต่ยังหวังจะให้ข้าเดินทางนับหมื่นลี้ไปแดนตะวันตกเพื่อส่งสารให้เจ้าเนี่ยนะ?

column2: I am the White Tiger Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect, Yan Luochong.
column3: ข้าคือทูตพยัคฆ์ขาวแห่งนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ เยี่ยนหลัวจง

column2: (Taking out Feng Xuanji's Golden Thread Phoenix Hairpin) Do you recognize this item?
How did you get this item?
The owner of this item asked me to tell the White Tiger Envoy that she needs his help.
She, she finally agreed to accept my help...
Thank you, {PlayerSurName} brother, for delivering the message. My swordsmanship is decent enough to be shown in public, so I'll give it to you as a token of gratitude.
Feng'er must have encountered great trouble, let's set off to help her as soon as possible.
Feng'er... The relations between you two seem complicated.
The promise of the past
column3: คำสัญญาในวันวาน

column2: Promise
column3: สัญญา

column2: Head to the Sacred Fire Sect in the Western Regions and deliver a message to the woman with the surname Feng.
column3: มุ่งหน้าไปยังนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ในแดนตะวันตกแล้วนำข้อความไปบอกแก่สตรีที่มีนามสกุล เฟิง

column2: Yan Luochong from the Great Snow Mountain asked me to tell you that his promise to you is still valid.
column3: เยี่ยนหลัวจง จากภูเขาหิมะอันยิ่งใหญ่ขอให้ข้ามาบอกเจ้าว่าคำสัญญาของเขาที่มีต่อเจ้ายังคงมีผลอยู่

column2: The phoenix hairpin that I gave to the young hero is a token to ask the White Tiger Envoy to fulfill his promise. Please, {PlayerSurName} young hero, go and return quickly.

Alas, how could I not know his intentions? But with his temperament, if he returns to the Sacred Fire Sect, he will inevitably clash with the sect leader, which is ultimately not good for him, so now is not the time.
How could I not know his intentions? But with the current situation of the Sacred Fire Sect, wouldn't it be
I am {1}, are you the Master of the Cold Skin Gang?
Yes, I am Huo Shilou, the Master of the Cold Skin Gang.

{PlayerSurName} young hero, since you have traveled here from the Central Plains, why not stay in Flame City for a few days and see how the scenery of the Western Regions differs from the Central Plains.
Inquire about the Blood Jewel
Inquire
Go to the Cold Skin Gang in the Western Regions and inquire about the Blood Jewel.
I have a request to make to Master Huo, please enlighten me.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, feel free to speak.

I happened to learn in the Central Plains that there is a magical item in the Western Regions called the Blood Jewel. With this item, one can make twice the progress with half the effort, and advance a thousand miles in a day's cultivation.
I heard that this item is produced by your gang, is this true or false?
The Blood Jewel is indeed produced by our gang. Although the rumors are somewhat exaggerated, it is indeed very beneficial to martial artists.
Since the Blood Jewel has unique properties, it must be valuable. How can I get the Blood Jewel?

To be honest, although the Blood Jewel can stimulate the circulation of Qi and blood, its effect is very domineering. If the foundation is not stable, there is a risk of obsession, paralysis in mild cases, and death from body explosion in severe cases.
In addition, many people with bad intentions are coveting the Blood Jewel. If this Blood Jewel is used to assist the tyrant, it would be a disaster for the martial arts world.
Therefore, I have ordered a temporary halt to the mining of the Blood Jewel, and the existing stock has been completely sealed and is strictly prohibited from circulating.
What a pity, it seems I am a step late.
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask who you are?
I am Zi Tian, the second master of the Cold Skin Gang. I have an irreconcilable hatred with the Sacred Fire Sect. If you want to cause trouble for the Sacred Fire Sect, count me in.
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask your name, sir?
column3: ข้าคือ{PlayerName} ขอทราบนามของท่านได้หรือไม่?

column2: Thank you for your help earlier, Shi Wenxiu thanks you here.
column3: ขอบใจในความช่วยเหลือของท่าน, สือเหวินซิ่วผู้นี้ขอขอบคุณจากใจ

column2: Drawing a sword to help when seeing injustice is my duty, Brother Shi doesn't need to be so polite.
column3: ข้าเพียงชักดาบเมื่อเห็นความอยุติธรรมก็เท่านั้น พี่สือไม่ต้องสุภาพนัก

column2: I'm not interested in your name, and who I am has nothing to do with you.
You'd better stay away from me, or you'll get infected with the Fire Toad poison on my body.
Fire Toad poison?
This poison is highly contagious. If it touches the skin, it feels like being roasted by fire. Then it will blister and fester, making people desperate.
I have never heard of this poison in the Central Plains, but it should not be difficult for me to cure. How about I help you diagnose and treat it first?
This Fire Toad poison is related to my abilities. If the poison is really cured, my abilities will be useless. It's hard for a useless person to survive in a place like the Western Regions.
Alright, I, {PlayerName}, might be able to cure your Flame Toad Venom. If you can't bear it one day, feel free to come to me for Detoxify.
My name is He Denuo, the fourth master of the Cold Skin Gang. I appreciate your kindness.
column3: ข้าชื่อเหอเต๋อนัว หัวหน้าสี่ของพรรคมังสาเหมันต์ ข้าซาบซึ้งในความมีน้ำใจของเจ้า

column2: Is this poison incurable?

This Flame Toad Venom is not a rare poison. There are at least four or five ways to Detoxify it. However, this venom is closely related to my skills. If the poison is cured, my skills will be useless.
Would you rather endure the torment of Desperation to keep this poisonous skill?
In a place like the Western Regions, you have to pay some price to stand out.

It is because of this Flame Toad Venom that I have become the fourth master of the Cold Skin Gang from a small Beggar who was Inseparable from fate. So, it's worth all the troubles I've been through over the years.
So you are the fourth master of the Cold Skin Gang, my apologies. I am {PlayerName}.
Cold Skin Gang's He Denuo.
column3: พรรคมังสาเหมันต์ เหอเต๋อนัว

column2: Chat
column3: สนทนา

column2: This place outside the pass is full of chaos. Isn't it very dangerous for the Innkeeper to open a shop here?
column3: ที่แห่งนี้ดูเต็มไปด้วยความโกลาหลมากมาย มาเปิดร้านแถวนี้ไม่คิดว่าอันตรายไปสำหรับเถ่าแก้เนี้ยหรือ?

column2: If it weren't for my Chang'an Inn providing a place for travelers to rest, most of the travelers going to the Western Regions from the Jade Gate would probably die trapped in the vast desert.
column3: หากไม่มีโรงเตี๊ยมฉางอันให้ที่พักพิงแก่เหล่านักเดินทางแล้วละก็ เหล่านักเดินทางที่มาจากทางประตูหยกคงได้ตายเพราะทะเลทรายแห่งนี้กันเกือบหมดแน่แท้

column2: Although the accommodation here is expensive, it's better than losing your life in the vast desert. So there are many customers who are willing to spend a lot of money.
column3: ที่นี่ค่าที่พักนั้นไม่ใช่น้อยๆ แต่ยังดีกว่าเอาชีวิตไปทิ้งไว้กลางทะเลทรายอันกว้างใหญ่ ดังนั้นจึงมีลูกค้าที่ยอมจ่ายเงินจำนวนมากอยู่ไม่น้อย

column2: As long as there is money to be made, any danger is nothing to me. This is what they call seeking wealth in danger.
column3: ตราบใดที่ทำเงินได้ ข้าก็ไม่เคยกลัวอันตรายใดๆ เขาถึงได้เรียกกันว่า "เสี่ยงโชคลาภ"

column2: When I opened the inn, I was very careful with my calculations, fearing that my income would not cover my expenses. If I had half the courage of this girl, I would have been rich by now.
The Innkeeper is brave and ambitious. It's a pity not to make a name in the martial arts world.
column3: เถ่าแก่เนี้ยช่างกล้าหาญและทะเยอทะยานนัก น่าเสียดายที่ท่านไม่ได้ไปโลดแล่นอยู่ในยุทธภพแห่งนี้

column2: If I had the ability to do anything, I wouldn't be staying in this godforsaken place.
column3: ถ้าข้าเก่งมากพอ ข้าคงไม่ต้องมานอนจมอยู่ที่พรรค์นี้หรอกนะ

column2: But you, {PlayerSurName}, with your demeanor, are not an ordinary Vagabond, are you? Do you have any plans for this trip to the Western Regions?
column3: แต่สำหรับท่าน{PlayerSurName}  ช่างมีบุคลิกและท่าทางที่ไม่เหมือนชาวยุทธทั่วไป การเดินทางมายังดินแดนตะวันตกครั้งนี้ คงมีจุดประสงค์แอบแฝงอยู่แน่

column2: Innkeeper, you're joking. I'm just here to broaden my horizons and join in the fun. What could I possibly be up to?
column3: เถ้าแก่เนี้ยล้อข้าเล่นแล้ว ข้าเพียงมาเปิดหูเปิดตา หาความบันเทิงไปเรื่อย ข้าจะมามีจุดประสงค์แอบแฝงอันใดได้?

column2: Hehe, you can fool others, but you can't fool me. Since you don't want to tell, I won't force you.
column3: ฮิฮิ เจ้าหลอกคนอื่นได้แต่หลอกข้าไม่ได้หรอก ในเมื่อเจ้าไม่อยากพูด ข้าก็ไม่บังคับ

column2: Question
column3: ถาม

column2: Innkeeper, did you ask Old Hunchback to charge me twenty-one Coins, twenty for the room and one for saving my life?
You scared me. I thought something had happened. Are you saying the room rate is too low?
Why should I pay twenty coins for a room in a inn like this? I've never stayed in such a shabby and old room.
Let me tell you, this inn doesn't charge by the day. Once you've paid, you can stay as long as you want. If you stay for a year or half a year, who would think the daily rate is expensive?
That seems reasonable, but you don't have many rooms. If you have a few long-term guests, won't you lose a lot?
Some people might go to bed and never wake up. They might lose their lives in the Western Regions at any time. If I don't collect the room fee in advance, who will I ask for money when they are dead?
So this is a black shop!
Don't talk nonsense. I run my business honestly and don't stoop to such low-level tricks.

The Western Regions are no match for the Central Plains. This is a lawless land, filled with gang forces everywhere. Today you kill me, tomorrow I kill you, the day after tomorrow a group of people kill each other. Whether you can survive or not depends on how tough your life is.
If you die nearby, I have to collect your body and bury you.\nConsidering this, our room price is simply a loss.
You really have gone to a lot of trouble...
But, what's the deal with one Coin for a life-saving fee!\nIs my life only worth one Coin? You look down on people too much!
Who would have thought that you would be revived with just a bowl of water. A bowl of water costs one Coin. I'm doing legitimate business and never overcharge. Charging one Coin is already too much.
This, this...
Do you have anything else to do?
No, no more.
Considering your relationship with me, it's not worth my help.
I am determined to become the deputy leader. If {PlayerSurName} brother can help me, I will definitely help {PlayerSurName} brother in the future.
As the Azure Dragon Envoy, I only obey the orders of the leader. I'm sorry, but I can't accept the sincere invitation of {PlayerSurName} deputy leader.
You and I have different paths and do not conspire together. There's no need to force others.
I wonder how many people in the world can withstand my long sword.
Don't I deserve a place in your team?
Who do you think you are, daring to invite me?
The deputy leader has ordered, I will obey!
The deputy leader's team is full, I can't join the team, I'm really helpless.
Xuanwu Envoy, now {PlayerSurName} brother needs people, let's help him, you come with me.
Yes!
{PlayerSurName} brother's team is full, I can't join.
I am the Vermilion Bird Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect, not just anyone is qualified to invite me.

I heard that the Azure Dragon Envoy is eager for the position of deputy leader. If he succeeds, I will have no good fruit in the Holy Fire Sect in the future. If you have the ability to fight for the position of deputy leader, I am willing to obey you.
Vermilion Bird Envoy Feng Xuanji obeys the deputy leader's orders.
The deputy leader's team is full, there is no place for me.
Now the Holy Fire Sect no longer exists, you have the title of deputy leader in vain, but now no one can be commanded. It is absolutely impossible for me to obey you!
I am not an ungrateful person, why not follow the young hero for a while.
The young hero's team is full, I really can't help.
You've got the wrong person, I won't just help others.
Even if you are the deputy leader, even if the leader comes in person, I will not be commanded.
I am willing to help you entirely for Feng'er's sake, you are not qualified.
Leave a place for me, only I can protect Feng'er.
I've been waiting for a long time!
Leave a place for me, only I can protect Feng'er.
Feng'er is no longer in the world, there is no one in the world worth my shot.
I never easily help others, unless it is someone who is kind to the Cold Skin Gang or to me.
Since Brother {PlayerSurName} has spoken, Zi Tian will surely follow even at the risk of his life.
I'm sorry, but Brother {PlayerSurName}'s team is full, I can't help you.
We walk different paths and should not conspire together.
Since Brother {PlayerSurName} has a request, Shi Wenxiu will surely not refuse.
column3: ในเมื่อน้องชาย{PlayerSurName} มีคำขอ สือเหวินซิ่วไม่อาจปฏิเสธอย่างแน่นอน

column2: Brother {PlayerSurName}'s team has no spare slots, I can't join.
My Fire Toad poison is extremely dangerous to others, it's better for you to stay away from me if you want to live.
It's rare to meet a like-minded brother, since you've invited me, I must oblige.
Your team already has too many people.
How much did you drink to get so drunk? I'm not someone who just follows anyone!
Finally, you've come to pick me up, my dear.
Hey, there's not a single spot left in your team, are you expecting me to starve?
Great hero {PlayerSurName}, we meet again!
column3: จอมยุทธ์{PlayerSurName} เราพบกันอีกแล้ว!

column2: Do we know each other?
column3: เรารู้จักกันด้วยรึ?

column2: Hmph, with your fame today, you naturally wouldn't remember a nobody who once challenged you.
column3: ฮึ่ม เจ้าโด่งดังขนาดนี้ ไม่แปลกคงจะจำผู้มาท้าดวลไม่ได้เลยล่ะสิ

column2: You seem to be the guy who planned to make a name for himself by challenging others.
column3: ข้าคือคนที่มีแผนว่าจะท้าประลองกับผู้อื่นเพื่อสร้างชื่อให้โด่งดังไงเล่า

column2: Hmph, I came today specifically to wash away the shame of that day!
column3: ฮึ่ยยย วันนี้ข้าจะมาขอล้างอายในอดีต!

column2: Since you've been watching me in secret, you must know that I'm not the same as before. You were defeated by me that day, what's different about you today?
column3: ในเมื่อเจ้าก็แอบดูข้ามานาน งั้นเจ้าก็ต้องรู้อ่ะสิว่าข้าไม่ใช่คนเดิมแล้ว เจ้าแพ้ข้าในวันนั้นแล้ววันนี้จะไปต่างอะไรกัน?

column2: I had a series of fortunate encounters in the <color=#c44b0e>Western Regions</color>, and was lucky enough to use the divine object <color=#c44b0e>Blood Jewel</color> to greatly increase my power, something you, a frog in a well, could never experience.
column3: ข้าออกท่องไปยัง<color=#c44b0e>แดนตะวันตก</color>หลายครา และโชคดีได้พบของศักดิ์สิทธิ์ <color=#c44b0e>อัญมณีเลือด</color> ด้วยสิ่งนี้มันทำให้ข้าแข็งแกร่งขึ้นอย่างมหาศาล! พลังที่กบในกะลาอย่างเจ้าคงไม่มีวันได้สัมผัส

column2: Western Regions... Blood Jewel...
column3: แดนตะวันตก... อัญมณีเลือด...

column2: Can you tell me how you got the Blood Jewel and how you went to the Western Regions?
column3: เจ้าบอกได้ไหมว่าเจ้าไปเอาอัญมณีเลือดที่ว่ามาจากไหน แล้วเจ้าไปยังแดนตะวันตกได้ยังไง?

column2: If you want to know this information, you have to defeat me first!
column3: ถ้าอยากรู้ก่อนชนะข้าให้ได้ก่อนแล้วกัน!

column2: The famous hero {PlayerSurName} is indeed not a match for me, it seems that these highly praised martial arts masters are not as good as they are made out to be.
column3: ดูเหมือนจอมยุทธ์{PlayerSurName}ผู้โด่งดัง ก็ไม่อาจเป็นคู่ต่อสู้ให้ข้าได้ ดูท่าว่าวรยุทธที่โอ้อวดกันโดยเหล่าปรมาจารย์ยุทธพวกนั้น ก็คงไม่ได้แน่อย่างที่คิด

column2: Enough talk, I was just careless just now, let's have another match if you dare!
column3: ช่างไร้สาระ ข้าก็แค่ประมาทไปแค่นั้นเอง ถ้าแน่จริงก็มาสู้กันอีกรอบหนึ่ง!

column2: You're no longer worthy to be my opponent, but you should really go to the Western Regions to broaden your horizons, so you don't remain ignorant of the world outside your well.
column3: เจ้าไม่คู่ควรจะเป็นคู่ต่อสู้ของข้าอีกต่อไป เจ้าควรไปเปิดหูเปิดตาที่ แดนตะวันตก ก่อนแล้วกัน เจ้าจะได้ไม่เป็นไอ้กบในกะลาที่อยู่แต่ในกะลาแบบนี้

column2: The Western Regions are to the west of the Zhongzhou Region, and you need to pass through the <color=#c44b0e>Jade Gate</color> to get there.
column3: แดนตะวันตกอยู่ทางตะวันตกของเขตจงโจว หากเจ้าอยากไปต้องข้าม <color=#c44b0e>ด่านประตูหยก</color> ถึงจะไปได้

column2: As for the Blood Jewel, don't get your hopes up, it's a special product of the Cold Skin Gang in the Western Regions, extremely rare and only available to the destined.
column3: ส่วนอัญมณีเลือดนั้น ก็อย่าหวังสูงไปแล้วกัน มันเป็นของวิเศษจากพรรคมังสาเหมันต์ในแดนตะวันตก ค่อนข้าหายากและผู้ที่ชะตากำหนดไว้เท่านั้นถึงจะได้รับมัน

column2: You don't seem to have made any progress, your proud journey to the Western Regions doesn't seem to have truly transformed you.
column3: ดูเหมือนเจ้าก็ไม่ได้เก่งขึ้นสักเท่าไหร่นะ การเดินทางไปแดนตะวันตกอันน่าภูมิใจของเจ้าก็ไม่ได้ทำให้เจ้าเก่งขึ้นสิกกะติ๊ดเลยนี่

column2: Hmph, what do you know! If it weren't for my self-restraint, you would have been a ghost under my blade by now.
column3: ฮึ่ม เจ้าจะไปรู้อะไร! ถ้าข้าไม่ออมมือให้เจ้าแล้วละก็ ตอนนี้เจ้าคงได้กลายเป็นวิญญาณใต้คมดาบข้าไปแล้ว!

column2: Did you only learn to brag in the Western Regions? If you have the ability, show all your skills, don't hide your incompetence, I'll make you admit defeat.
column3: เจ้าไปร่ำเรียนวรยุทธการใช้ปากมาจากแดนตะวันตกมาหรือยังไง? ถ้ามีฝีมือก็อวดผีมือมา ไม่ใช่มาอวดแต่ปากของเจ้า ถ้ายังไม่พอก็เข้ามาอีกที ข้าจะทำให้เจ้ายอมรับความพ่ายแพ้อย่างแท้จริง

column2: Since you're seeking your own death, I'll let you see the true power of the Blood Jewel!
column3: ในเมื่อเจ้ารนหาที่ตาย ข้าจะแสดงพลังที่แท้จริงของอัญมณีเลือดให้ดู!

column2: How is this possible... how is this possible...
column3: มันเป็นไปได้ยังไงกัน... มันเป็นไปได้ยังไงกัน...

column2: Your strength suddenly surged just now, could this be the effect of the Blood Jewel?
column3: พลังของเจ้าดูจะเก่งกาจขึ้นทันตา หรือว่านี่เป็นผลข้างเคียงจากการใช้อัญมณีเลือดกัน?

column2: I can't believe that even with the power of the Blood Jewel, I'm still no match for you...
column3: ข้าไม่อยากจะเชื่อ ขนาดใช้พลังจากอัญมณีเลือดข้ายังสู้เจ้าไม่ได้ด้วยซ้ำ...

column2: The Blood Jewel indeed has extraordinary powers, it's a waste to use it on you.
column3: อัญมณีเลือดให้พลังอันมหาศาล มาใช้กับเจ้าช่างเสียเปล่าจริงๆ

column2: Since you've been defeated, please tell me how to get to the Western Regions, and how you got the Blood Jewel.
column3: ในเมื่อเจ้าแพ้แล้วก็บอกมาว่าเจ้าไปเอาอัญมณีเลือดที่ว่ามาจากไหน แล้วเจ้าไปยังแดนตะวันตกได้ยังไง?

column2: To the west of Zhongzhou Region is the Western Regions, to get there you need to pass through the <color=#c44b0e>Jade Gate</color>... (Breathing becomes more and more rapid)
column3: แดนตะวันตกอยู่ทางตะวันตกของเขตจงโจว หากเจ้าอยากไปต้องข้าม <color=#c44b0e>ด่านประตูหยก</color> ถึงจะไปได้ (ลมหายใจเริ่มเร็วขึ้นเรื่อยๆ)

column2: This Blood Jewel... comes from the Cold Skin Gang in the Western Regions, it's extremely rare... (Blood continuously flows from the seven orifices)
column3: ส่วนอัญมณีเลือดนั้น มันเป็นสินค้าพิเศษของพรรคมังสาเหมันต์ในแดนตะวันตก ค่อนข้าหายากและ... (เลือดต่างไหลออกจากทวารทั้งเจ็ด)

column2: I didn't mean to kill you, why are you like this now?
column3: ข้าไม่ได้ตั้งใจจะข้าเจ้า ทำไมเจ้าเป็นแบบนี้เนี่ย?

column2: Cough, cough, {PlayerName}, sooner or later I will step on you, you are always my stepping stone to fame! (Turns and walks away, the coughing seems to get more frequent, and finally everything falls silent)
column3: แค่ก แค่ก {PlayerName} อีกไม่นานข้าจะเหยียบย่ำเจ้าให้ได้ เจ้าจะเป็นบันไดให้ข้าไปสู่ความสำเร็จของข้า! (จอมยุทธผู้นี้หันหลังจากไปพร้อมไอถี่ขึ้นและถี่ยิ่งขึ้น จากนั้นไม่นานทุกอย่างก็เงียบสงัดลง)

column2: Why should the flute complain about the willows, the spring breeze does not pass the Jade Gate...
column3: ไฉนเลยขลุ่ยจึงด่าทอต้นอ้อ เพียงเพราะลมหวนมิเคยผ่านด่านประตูหยก...

column2: According to the situation here, it seems not easy to pass through this world-famous Jade Gate.
column3: ดูจากสถานการณ์แล้ว ไม่ง่ายเลยที่จะผ่านประตูหยกเลื่องชื่อแห่งนี้ไปได้

column2: {yell} You bunch of stingy warriors want to pass, it's simply wishful thinking!
column3: {yell} ไอ้พวกจอมยุทธตัวเหม็นคิดจะผ่านไปไม่ง่ายหรอก!

column2: {yell} If you don't get out of here, I'll slaughter you all as Horse bandits trying to cause trouble!
column3: {yell}หากพวกเจ้ายังไม่ไป ข้าจะผ่าร่างเจ้าให้เหมือนโจรเลยคอยดู

column2: Bring it on, I'm not afraid of you!
column3: ก็มาสิวะ คิดว่าข้ากลัวรึไง!

column2: It's better to be peaceful, why use weapons?
column3: จะสู้ไปทำไม ไยต้องหันอาวุธหากัน

column2: Who will get the deer is still unknown
column3: ใครจะหมู่จะจ่าเดี๋ยวก็รู้

column2: I've been annoyed by you soldiers for a long time
You want to kill the innocent in broad daylight!
No money, no life!
These people seem a bit tough
We won't die here today, will we?
Both sides are at a stalemate, I should choose...
Pay a toll of twenty taels. <color=#097a76>(20000 Coins)</color>
Drive away these Vagabonds.
Ask the General how to get out.
column3: ถามท่านแม่ทัพว่าจะผ่านไปได้ยังไง

column2: Force your way through! (Specific battle)
column3: ฝ่าเข้าไป! (เข้าสู่การต่อสู้)

column2: Show the Imperial token.
column3: แสดงตราจักรพรรดิ

column2: Quietly run away.
column3: ออกไปอย่างเงียบๆ

column2: Both sides are still at a stalemate, I should choose...
Generals, I'm new here, how can I get out of this Jade Gate?
column3: ท่านแม่ทัพข้าพึ่งมาถึง ข้าจะผ่านประตูหยกแห่งนี้ไปได้ยังไงหรือท่าน?

column2: It seems you're not like those guys, you should be a reasonable person.
column3: ดูเหมือนเจ้าจะไม่ไร้เหตุผลเลยทีเดียว แบบนี้พอคุยกันได้

column2: The toll is <color=#c44b0e>twenty taels</color>, you can go as soon as you pay.
column3: ค่าผ่านทางทั้งหมด <color=#c44b0e>20 ตำลึง</color> ถ้าจ่ายก็ผ่านไปได้

column2: So expensive! No wonder these Vagabonds have objections.
column3: แพงมาก! ไม่แปลกใจทำไมเหล่าจอมยุทธถึงพากันประท้วง

column2: What can we do, stationed in such a desolate place, our military pay is deducted a lot.
column3: จะให้ทำยังไง อยู่ชายแดนแบบนี้ พวกข้าไม่มีรายได้พอเลี้ยงลูกเมียหรอกนะ

column2: If there's no income, the soldiers will mutiny.
column3: หากไม่มีรายได้ เหล่าทหารก็จะพากันกบฎ

column2: In short, if you have money, you can go to the Western Regions, whether you're treasure hunting or trading, it has nothing to do with us.
column3: สั้นๆ ถ้ามีเงินเจ้าก็ไปแดนตะวันตกได้ จะไปล่าสมบัติค้าขายอะไร พวกข้าไม่สนทั้งนั้น

column2: However, if you can help us drive away these Vagabonds, we can let you pass for free.
column3: อย่างไรก็ตาม หากเจ้าช่วยพวกข้าไล่จอมยุทธเหล่านี้ออกไป ข้าให้เจ้าไปได้ฟรีๆเลย

column2: Please allow me to think about it...
column3: ขอข้าคิดก่อนนะ...

column2: Here are twenty taels, please accept, General.
Hmm, you're indeed reasonable.\nBut are you sure you don't want to consider the suggestion of passing for free?
No, these guys look tough, I don't want to die here.
Alright, stop talking to him, let him go quickly, don't make trouble here!
Open the gate, let him pass!
I am {PlayerName}, entrusted by the military master, but I do not wish to be enemies with you all. Therefore, I kindly ask you to disperse, so as not to disrupt the harmony of the martial world.
{PlayerName}? Never heard of it.
Where did this little character come from?
Trying to stop a chariot with a mantis arm, overestimating oneself.
Wanting to show off without considering the situation.
So young, what a pity.
{yell}, who are you trying to scare? If you have the guts, let's have a match!
Since I can't persuade you, I'll have to let my strength do the talking.
Indeed, the waves behind drive on those before.
When did such a character appear in the martial world?
What a clever strategy to drive the tiger to swallow the wolf.
Alas, I didn't expect someone to complicate things.
Can't get out today, let's talk another day.
Let's go, let's go.
With Blue Mountain left, there's no fear of running out of firewood.
Let's wait for the kid to leave before we continue.
I didn't expect him to be {PlayerName}!
I heard this kid is very powerful.
Damn it, I'm not sure I can win.
It's better to listen to advice and leave.
Since {PlayerSurName} has stepped in, we'd better not ask for trouble.
If we all rush him, we might be able to beat him!
Just a pretty boy, his fame is probably all talk.
Dare to block my way, I'll kill any god that stands in my way!
Stubborn and asking for trouble!
Indeed, his reputation is well-deserved.
Losing to {PlayerName} is not a loss of face.
You've got guts, I respect you.
Now I need to ask the two generals to keep their promise.
Big brother, now that he's alone, why don't we...
Big brother, this kid doesn't have many helpers, why don't we take the opportunity...
Get lost, if you want to die, don't drag me into it!
Open the gate, let him pass!
column3: เปิดประตู ให้เขาเข้าไป!

column2: You, what are you trying to do!
column3: เจ้า เจ้าจะทำอะไรน่ะ!

column2: You guards should be honored for guarding the border, but you exploit the pedestrians under the guise of duty, abusing your power for personal gain, this is an unforgivable crime!
column3: นายด่านประตูอย่างพวกเจ้าควรจะมีเกียรติที่ได้ปกป้องชายแดน แต่พวกเจ้าดันกลับมาใช้ช่องโหว่หลอกเอาเงินผู้คนโดยอ้างว่าเป็นหน้าที่ ใช้อำนาจในทางที่ไม่ชอบ นับว่าเป็นความผิดอาญาแผ่นดิน!

column2: Now that you've incurred public wrath, today we will act for the heavens!
column3: วันนี้เจ้าจะได้รับรู้ความโกรธของผู้คน วันนี้พวกเราจะกระทำเพื่อสวรรค์!

column2: I don't know you, don't drag me into your rebellion.
column3: เฮ้ย ข้าไม่รู้เรื่อง อย่าลากข้าไปเป็นกบฎ

column2: The young man is too impulsive.
column3: ไอ้นี่บ้าใหญ่แล้ว

column2: We were just talking, you really started a fight.
column3: เราแค่มาโวยเฉยๆ ข้าไม่ได้จะมาสู้

column2: The people can't fight with the officials, this kid is crazy.
column3: บ้าหรือไงไปสู้กับทางการ

column2: I'm just here to watch, don't look for me if you start a fight.
column3: เฮ้ย ข้าไม่รู้เรื่อง อย่าลากข้าไปเป็นกบฎ

column2: Kid, what did you just say, you want to act for the heavens?
column3: ไอ้หนู เมื่อกี้ว่ายังไงนะ กระทำเพื่อสวรรค์หรือ?

column2: Dare you repeat what you just said?
column3: กล้าพูดอีกทีไหมเล่า?

column2: Since I can't count on those spineless cowards, I'll have to do it myself.
column3: ในเมื่อไว้ใจไอ้พวกตาขาวไม่ได้ ข้าทำเองคนเดียวก็ได้

column2: The Jade Gate is now unobstructed, I can now go to the Western Regions.
column3: ประตูหยกไม่มีอะไรขวางต่อไปแล้ว ข้าสามารถไปยังแดนตะวันตกได้แล้ว

column2: This gate doesn't seem very sturdy, I'll try to open it...
column3: ประตูนี่ดูจะไม่หนักหนาอันใด ข้าลองเปิดเองดูได้...

column2: Hey!
column3: ฮึบ!

column2: Ha!
column3: ฮ่า!

column2: Break it for me!!!
column3: จงพังเดี๋ยวนี้!!!

column2: The Jade Gate is now unobstructed, I can now go to the Western Regions.
column3: ประตูหยกไม่มีอะไรขวางต่อไปแล้ว ข้าสามารถไปยังแดนตะวันตกได้แล้ว

column2: (Shows Imperial token)
{yell}'s Imperial token is here, as if the emperor himself is present!
Long live the emperor!
Open the Jade Gate!
Yes!
Open the gate, see the young hero off!
Gentlemen, please show mercy...
column3: ท่านสุภาพบุรุษ เมตตาข้าเถิดขอรับ...

column2: You're lucky to run into me, we only want money and goods, no killing.
column3: เจ้าโชคดีแค่ไหนแล้ว พวกข้าอยากได้เพียงสินค้าและเงินทอง ไม่คิดฆ่า

column2: You can take the money, but these goods are my life.
column3: ท่านเอาเงินไปเท่าไหร่ก็เอาไปได้เลยขอรับ แต่สินค้าเหล่านี้เป็นดั่งชีวิตข้าเลยนะขอรับ

column2: You've traveled thousands of miles to the Western Regions for trade, these goods must be valuable, there's no reason to let go of the wealth at hand.
column3: เจ้าเดินทางมานับหมื่นลี้มายังแดนตะวันตกนี้ สินค้าพวกนี้ต้องมีราคาเป็นอย่างมาก ไม่มีเหตุผลเลยที่ข้าจะปล่อยเงินทองเหล่านี้หลุดลอยไป

column2: You, don't push your luck, the bodyguards I hired are not bad, you may not...
column3: เจ้า อย่ามาลองดีนักนะ ผู้คุมกันที่ข้าจ้างมาไม่ใช่เล่นๆทั้งนั้น เจ้าควรจะ...

column2: Hehe, greedy guy who doesn't value his life.
column3: ฮ่าฮ่าฮ่า ไอ้โลภนี้ไม่เห็นค่าชีวิตซะแล้ว

column2: Ah!
column3: อ้าก!

column2: Such bad luck!
column3: ลางไม่ดีอีกแล้ว!

column2: You, you...
column3: จ.. เจ้า...

column2: Since the blade has tasted blood, it seems I have to send you all to reunite.
column3: ในเมื่อดาบข้าได้ดื่มเลือดแล้ว ดูเหมือนข้าต้องส่งพวกเจ้าไปรวมญาติกันบนสวรรค์

column2: Just out of Jade Gate and there's trouble, should I meddle in this?
column3: ออกมาจากประตูหยกไม่ทันไรก็มีเรื่องซะแล้ว ข้าควรเข้าไปยุ่งดีไหม?

column2: Guard the tea merchant! (Specific battle)
column3: ปกป้องพ่อค้าชา (เข้าสู่การต่อสู้)

column2: Back away from this place.
column3: หลบไปจากที่นี้

column2: The player turns around and runs away from the current scene, returning to the Western Regions map (near the Jade Gate).
column3: คุณหันหลังกลับแล้วจากไป

column2: Who are you?!
column3: แกเป็นใคร?!

column2: When seeing injustice, draw your sword to help.
column3: ข้าเพียงชักดาบเมื่อเห็นความอยุติธรรมก็เท่านั้น

column2: The last one who bragged, now his grave is waist-high with grass, are you tired of living too?
column3: ไอ้คนล่าสุดที่พูดไปล่าสุดตอนนี้ที่หน้าหลุมศพมันมีหญ้าสูงเท่าเอวแล้ว เจ้าเองก็อยากตายใช่ไหม?

column2: The last one who dared to threaten me, now doesn't even have a grave, are you sure you want to be my enemy?
column3: ไอ้คนล่าสุดที่กล้ามาขู่ข้า ตอนนี้ยังไม่มีหลุมให้อยู่เลย เจ้าแน่ใจนะจะมาหาเรื่องข้า?

column2: {yell}, you're courting death!
column3: {yell}รนหาที่ตาย!

column2: It's a pity that I couldn't save them...
The weather in the Western Regions is unpredictable, the sandstorm here is getting bigger, how should I deal with this cart of goods and two corpses?
Search the goods.
Bury the corpses.

You found a lot of valuable tea leaves in the horse cart, they were probably going to trade in the Western Regions, but they didn't expect to encounter an accident halfway, and you ended up benefiting.\nSeeing the sandstorm rising, you didn't care about the increasingly cold corpses, and hurriedly ran away from here.

You couldn't bear to leave the tea merchants' bodies in the wilderness, so you found a place to bury them properly.\nWhen burying the tea merchants, a damaged map of the Western Regions accidentally fell from them, roughly indicating that there is an inn nearby.\nSeeing the sandstorm rising, you didn't care about searching the goods on the horse cart, and planned to go to the inn on the map to avoid the sandstorm.
Hero, please save the Innkeeper, please save the Innkeeper...
He is beyond saving, I can't help him.
The Western Regions are too dangerous for you, you should go back where you came from.
I came with the Innkeeper, I can't let him die alone in the wilderness, I, I want to take him back...

You escorted the little Clerk carrying the tea merchant's body back to Jade Gate.\nBefore parting, the little Clerk thanked you for saving his life and gave you a damaged map of the Western Regions, roughly indicating an inn.\nSeeing the sandstorm rising, you watched the little Clerk run away, and planned to go to the inn on the map to avoid the sandstorm.
Young hero, you are really capable, these blind guys are simply seeking their own death.
column3: ท่านจอมยุทธน้อย ท่านนี้ยอดยุทธจริงๆ ไอ้พวกตามืดหม่นเหล่านี้รนหาที่ตายแท้ๆ

column2: Young hero, you are so skilled, how about I hire you as a bodyguard?\nAs long as you ensure the safety of me and the goods, and can safely reach the Western Regions <color=#c44b0e>Flame City</color>.
column3: ท่านจอมยุทธน้อยดูเก่งกาจนัก ข้าจ้างท่านเป็นผู้คุ้มภัยเอาไหม?\nจนกว่าท่านจะพาเราและสินค้าไปส่งถึงแดนตะวันตกที่ <color=#c44b0e>เมืองอัคคี</color>

column2: The commission is 100 guan, 20 guan in advance, and the rest will be paid in full when we safely arrive at Flame City, how about it?
column3: ค่าจ้างหากสำเร็จข้ามอบให้ 100 ตำลึงเลย ค่าจ่ายให้ท่านก่อนด้วย 20 ตำลึงเลยเอ้า ที่เหลือจะจ่ายเมื่อเราถึงเมืองอัคคี ท่านว่าอย่างไร?

column2: Let me think about it...
column3: ให้ข้าคิดดูก่อน...

column2: Agree to be the tea merchant's bodyguard.
column3: ตกลงจะคุ้มภัยให้พ่อค้าชา

column2: Refuse to be the tea merchant's bodyguard.
column3: ปฎิเสธที่จะคุ้มภัยให้พ่อค้าชา

column2: I am {PlayerName}, from now on, I am your bodyguard.
column3: ข้า {PlayerName} จากนี้จะขอคุ้มภัยให้พวกท่าน

column2: Alright, I will rely on you, {PlayerSurName} young hero, all the way.
column3: ดี ข้ารบกวนท่านแล้วท่านจอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName}

column2: This is the Clerk I brought from the shop, his safety is also your responsibility.
column3: เสี่ยเอ้อผู้นี้ข้าเองก็ไปซื้อตัวมาจากโรงเตี๊ยม ความปลอดภัยของเขาข้าก็ฝากท่านด้วยนะ

column2: Thank you, {PlayerSurName} hero.
column3: ขอบคุณท่านมาก ท่านจอมยุทธ{PlayerSurName}

column2: The sandstorm is rising here, let's hurry up. There is an inn not far away, let's go there to avoid the sandstorm.
column3: พายุทรายกำลังมาแล้ว รีบไปกันเถิด โรงเตี๊ยวอยู่ไม่ไกลจากที่นี่ รีบไปก่อนที่พายุทรายจะมา

column2: I'm used to being free and don't like restraint, I appreciate your kindness.
column3: ข้านั้นคุ้นเคยกับการเป็นอิสระเสียมากกว่า ขอบใจในความมีน้ำใจของท่านด้วย

column2: In this vast Western Region, without a familiar guide, I'm afraid you'll never find your way out in your lifetime, and you'll die here alive.
Young hero, you might as well weigh it carefully before giving me an answer.
My answer is still the same, I'm not interested in being someone else's bodyguard.
Humph, you just fend for yourself.
Likewise, likewise.
I seem to... can't get out of here...
After many years away from the Western Regions, I never thought I could return to my homeland in my lifetime...
There are many deserts like this in the Western Regions, where people can easily get lost and die, but they can't stop me.
Under the guidance of Man Tuoluo, you and your Pedestrian successfully walked out of the desert.
Thanks to you, otherwise, even with my great abilities, I would have died in this desert.
If I remember correctly, there should be an inn not far from here, I wonder if it's still in operation.
In a daze, someone seems to be giving you water...\nThe fatigue on your body gradually dissipates...\nYour consciousness gradually awakens, but you find the environment very strange...
You're not dead yet, that's easy to handle.
Easy to handle? What's easy to handle?
Twenty-one coins, your room money and your life-saving money.
Twenty... coins? Where did the room money come from, and the life-saving money???

You are now staying in the No. 1 room of Chang'an Inn, the room fee is twenty coins; you were unconscious in the desert, it was the clerk who carried you back, the innkeeper said your life is worth at least one coin, a total of twenty-one coins.
Are you bullying me for not staying in an inn? How can this broken place be worth twenty coins!
Also, why does your innkeeper say my life is only worth one coin!
I'm just here to collect money, if you have any problems, go talk to the innkeeper.
What if I refuse to pay?

It's up to you, the innkeeper said if you don't pay, he'll dismantle the doors and windows at night, let you blow a night of wind and sand; when he cooks for you, he'll add extra ingredients, it won't kill you, but it definitely won't let you have a good time.
Your innkeeper is really mercantile.
Here you go, twenty-one coins, not one coin less! I'll go to the innkeeper for an explanation later.
Thank you for your patronage, you can call me Old Hunchback in the future.
I can't even make up twenty coins.
The innkeeper expected this, and ordered you to hand over all your money and he won't bother you. The innkeeper is really a big-hearted Bodhisattva.
This is all I have, not a penny more.
Thank you for your patronage, you can call me Old Hunchback in the future.
I've seen countless people, and you're the first one to dare to talk big in front of me. Do you have the guts to repeat what you just said?
Destroy the Holy Fire Sect! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
Don't take it seriously, it's just nonsense.
I don't like people joking around. If you dare to do it again, don't blame me for not being sentimental.
Arrogant fool!
Dragonfly ants also want to shake the tree, today I will show you the difference between heaven and earth!
If you want to destroy the Holy Fire Sect, you have to pass me first!
As long as you are an enemy of the Holy Fire Sect, no matter who you are, go to hell for me!
{PlayerName}, is this your choice?
As long as I am the White Tiger Envoy for a day, I have the duty to protect this sect.

Dominate the Western Regions, compete in the Central Plains, and finally turn into a dream.
The eyes of a generation of Western Region heroes are full of regret, unwillingness, and helplessness at the end.
At the peak, the once endless life force of the Holy Fire finally dimmed, until it turned into a wisp of smoke rising to the nine heavens.
The Holy Fire Sect is now in name only, and soon no one will mention the Holy Fire Sect.
It's like a stone thrown into the vast ocean, disappearing forever.
<size=250%><color=#E3170D>The Holy Fire Sect, destroyed!</color></size>
Cold Skin Gang is unwilling to make enemies, but will not tolerate humiliation. If you insist on this, the knife in Huo's hand is not blunt!
Exterminate Cold Skin Gang! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the war directly)</color>
Don't take it seriously, it's just nonsense.
Please be careful with your words, such jokes should not be made casually.
How can Cold Skin Gang tolerate such insolence!
Today, let you know why Cold Skin Gang has been standing in the Western Regions for more than a decade and why no one dares to offend us even though we hold treasures!
Being an enemy of Cold Skin Gang is being an enemy of me, Zi Tian. If you have the ability, step over my corpse!
I never thought we would cross swords before this, but today I have to believe it!
I, He Denuo, am forever with Cold Skin Gang!
column3: ข้า เหอเต๋อนัว อยู่และตายไปพรรคมังสาเหมันต์!

column2:
As the leaders of Cold Skin Gang fell one by one, the glory of Cold Skin Gang gradually faded.
Until the last person was killed, Cold Skin Gang became history.
Whether the master of Cold Skin Gang was a hero or a villain is meaningless, and will soon be forgotten by most people.
The Flame City, which lost its master, still has endless life force and prosperity. This is the only mark left by Cold Skin Gang in the world.
<size=250%><color=#E3170D>Cold Skin Gang, annihilated!</color></size>
It seems that there are still fish that escaped the net, and it's a pity that Cold Skin Gang was not wiped out in one fell swoop.
Finally, there's a place to rest. This long journey almost took half of my life.
column3: ในที่สุดก็มีที่ให้พักเสียที การเดินทางไกลครั้งนี้ข้าเหนื่อยหยั่งกับใช้เวลาไปครึ่งค่อนชีวิต

column2: This, something seems wrong here.
column3: เดี๋ยว มีบางอย่างแปลกๆ

column2: I, the general, think you look sleazy and not like a good person. You're probably a wanted criminal who escaped from somewhere else.
column3: ข้า แม่ทัพผู้นี้คิดว่าเจ้าท่าทางน่าสงสัยไม่น่าใช่คนดี เจ้าอาจจะเป็นโจรที่หลบหนีมาจากที่อื่นแน่ๆ

column2: The net of heaven has wide meshes but lets nothing through. Now that you've run into me, the general, do you want to settle this publicly or privately?
column3: สวรรค์มีตามิเคยปล่อยผู้ร้ายรอดไปได้ วันนี้เจ้ามาเจอข้า ท่านแม่ทัพผู้นี้ เจ้าอยากจะจัดการปัญหานี้เงียบๆหรืออยากให้ฝูงชนดูด้วยเล่า?

column2: If you want to collect my life-saving money, it seems you've chosen the wrong person.
column3: ถ้าเจ้าจะมาปล้นเงินที่ข้าเก็บมาทั้งชีวิต ข้าว่าท่านปล้นผิดคนแล้ว

column2: Cut the crap, either you go to jail for a few years, or you pay me, the general, and I'll let you go.
column3: หยุดพูดมาก จะไปติดคุกสักสองสามปี หรือจะจ่ายให้ท่านแม่ทัพผู้นี้ แล้วข้าจะปล่อยเจ้าไป

column2: Fine, you resist arrest and commit violence, your crime is the same as rebellion!
column3: ได้ ในเมื่อเจ้าขัดขืนการจับกุม และกล้าทำร้ายเจ้าพนักงาน ความผิดของเจ้าเท่ากับกบฎ!

column2: {yell}Guards, arrest the rebel in front of you!
column3: {yell}ทหาร จับกบฎตรงหน้าเจ้า!

column2: Yes, sir!
column3: ขอรับ!

column2: This man is too straightforward, he actually confronts the soldiers, I should...
column3: ชายผู้นี้นั้นขวานผ่าซากดีแท้ แถมยังกล้าไปท้าทหารพวกนี้อีก ข้าควรจะ...

column2: Help the man out! (Specific battle)
column3: ออกไปช่วย (เข้าสู่การต่อสู้)

column2: Just watch the changes.
column3: รอดูว่าจะเกิดอะไรขึ้น

column2: Where did this guy come from? Are you guys together?
column3: ไอ้หมอนี่มาจากไหน? พวกแกสมรู้ร่วมคิดกันใช่ไหม?

column2: I can't stand it when many people bully a few, especially you who exploit the people under the guise of legality.
column3: คนหมู่มากมารุมคนหมู่น้อย ข้าเห็นแล้วรับไม่ได้ โดยเฉพาะไอ้พวกใช้ช่องโหว่กฎหมายอ้างว่าผู้อื่นทำผิดโต้งๆ

column2: {PlayerSurName}Young hero, you are my hired bodyguard, why bother to meddle in other people's business?
column3: จอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName} ข้าจ้างท่านเป็นผู้คุ้มภัย ทำไมท่านต้องไปสอดเรื่องคนอื่นด้วย?

column2: You hide on the side first, so as not to hurt you when the fight starts.
column3: ท่านหลบไปก่อนเถิด จะได้ไม่โดนลูกหลงเอา

column2: Reckless fool
column3: บ้าบิ่นจริงๆ

column2: Sooner or later I will be killed by you
column3: สักวันข้าต้องตายเพราะเจ้านี่แน่ๆ

column2: {yell}Arrest them, arrest them all, don't let anyone escape!
column3: {yell}จับมัน จับพวกมันให้หมด อย่าให้ใครหนีไปได้!

column2: Good man, spare my life, I was blinded by lard, I shouldn't have made enemies with you two!
column3: ท่านพ่อพระ ได้โปรดไว้ชีวิตข้าน้อยด้วย ข้าเพียงดวงตามืดบอดเพราะความโลภ ข้าไม่ได้ต้องการมีเรื่องกับพวกท่านเลย!

column2: It's better to...
column3: มันจะดีกว่านี้ถ้า...

column2: Gentlemen, can you give me some face?
column3: ท่านสุภาพบุรุษทั้งหลาย ไว้หน้าข้าหน่อยได้ไหม?

column2: This is a misunderstanding, let's have a drink and cool down.
column3: นี่คงเป็นเพียงการเข้าใจผิด มาดื่มให้ใจเย็นกันเถอะ

column2: Who is this lady...?
column3: สตรีผู้นี้เป็นใครกัน...?

column2: I'm, uh, Haitang Qiu, the innkeeper of this inn.
column3: ข้า เอ่อ ไห่ถังฉิว เจ้าของโรงเตี๊ยมแห่งนี้

column2: Yes, yes, misunderstanding.
column3: ใช่ ใช่ มันเป็นเพียงการเข้าใจผิดแค่นั้น

column2: Innkeeper, serve the wine, I'll apologize to the two heroes!
column3: เถ้าแก่เนี้ย เอาสุราออกมา ข้าต้องขออภัยท่านผู้กล้าสองท่านนี้!

column2: Here comes the good wine~
column3: สุราดีๆมาแล้ว~

column2: I respect you two heroes, we don't fight, don't know each other, if you need my help in the future, just say it.
column3: ข้าขอคารวะท่านผู้กล้าทั้งสอง เรามิเคยได้สู้รบกันมาก่อน และไม่รู้จักกันมาก่อน แต่หากท่านต้องการให้ข้าช่วยอะไรในภายภาคหน้า กรุณาบอกข้าได้เลย

column2: I'm not interested in having relations with the court.
column3: ข้าไม่อยากยุ่งกับพวกทางการ

column2: No problem, no problem. I still have military affairs to deal with, two heroes, we will meet again in the future.
column3: ไม่มีปัญหาขอรับ ไม่มีปัญหาขอรับ ข้ายังมีธุระทางการทหารที่ต้องไปดูแล ท่านผู้กล้าทั้งสองรักษาตัวขอรับ

column2: Thank you for your righteous action, I'm not feeling well, I'll go back to my room to rest.
column3: ขอบคุณสำหรับการกระทำอันชอบธรรมของท่านด้วย ข้ารู้สึกไม่ดี ขอตัวกลับห้องพักก่อน

column2: Please feel free to do as you wish, hero.
column3: ตามสบาย ท่านจอมยุทธ

column2: Phew, finally got rid of these army riffraff.
column3: เฮ้อ ในที่สุดก็ไล่ไอ้พวกกองทัพขอทานนี่ไปได้

column2: Old Hunchback, quickly close the shop door, there's going to be a black sandstorm on the Horse.
column3: ตาแก่หลังค่อม  รีบไปปิดประตูร้านซะ  เดี๋ยวพายุทรายดำจะมาแล้ว

column2: Little Lame, hurry back to the kitchen to cook, don't let the guests go hungry.
column3: ไอ้ขาเป๋ รีบกลับเข้าครัวเลยไป อย่าให้แขกรอจนหิวสิ

column2: Yes!
column3: ขอรับ!

column2: Okay.
column3: ได้ๆ

column2: (Closes the shop door tightly)
column3: (ปิดประตูแน่น)

column2: He's asking for it! Take him down and lock him up in the jail to teach him a lesson.
Gentlemen, can you give me some face?
column3: ท่านสุภาพบุรุษทั้งหลาย ไว้หน้าข้าหน่อยได้ไหม?

column2: Who are you to ask us to give you face?
You little rascal, you really haven't seen the world, she is the innkeeper of this Chang'an Inn, Haitang Qiu.
Let's all have a drink, gentlemen, let's cool down.
Innkeeper Hai, you're getting more and more handsome. If you're willing to have a drink with this general, how about we let this guy go?
I don't mind, but if my sister knew...
You won't mind a joke with the innkeeper, will you?
Having a drink is a small matter, but...
If you knew you were taking guests away from the shop, it would be inappropriate to hurt their face.
Forget it, this general doesn't want to provoke the people of the Holy Fire Sect.
Kid, you're lucky. Dismiss, return to camp!
Thank you for your righteous action, I'm not feeling well, I'll go back to my room to rest.
Phew, finally got rid of these army riffraff.
column3: เฮ้อ ในที่สุดก็ไล่ไอ้พวกกองทัพขอทานนี่ไปได้

column2: Old Hunchback, quickly close the shop door, there's going to be a black sandstorm on the Horse.
column3: ตาแก่หลังค่อม  รีบไปปิดประตูร้านซะ  เดี๋ยวพายุทรายดำจะมาแล้ว

column2: Little Lame, hurry back to the kitchen to cook, don't let the guests go hungry.
column3: ไอ้ขาเป๋ รีบกลับเข้าครัวเลยไป อย่าให้แขกรอจนหิวสิ

column2: Yes!
column3: ขอรับ!

column2: Okay.
column3: ได้ๆ

column2: (Closes the shop door tightly)
column3: (ปิดประตูแน่น)

column2: Spare me, hero, I was blinded by lard, I shouldn't have been your enemy!
It's better to...
Sir, could you give me a break?
This is all a misunderstanding, let's all have a drink and cool down.
column3: นี่คงเป็นเพียงการเข้าใจผิด มาดื่มให้ใจเย็นกันเถอะ

column2: Who is this lady...?
column3: สตรีผู้นี้เป็นใครกัน...?

column3: ข้า เอ่อ ไห่ถังฉิว เจ้าของโรงเตี๊ยมแห่งนี้

column2: Yes, yes, misunderstanding.
column3: ใช่ ใช่ มันเป็นเพียงการเข้าใจผิดแค่นั้น

column2: Innkeeper, bring up the wine, I need to apologize to this hero!
column3: เถ้าแก่เนี้ย เอาสุราออกมา ข้าต้องขออภัยท่านผู้กล้าสองท่านนี้!

column2: Here comes the good wine~
column3: สุราดีๆมาแล้ว~

column2: I respect you, hero, we don't fight, don't know each other, if you need my help in the future, just say it.
column3: ข้าขอคารวะท่านผู้กล้าทั้งสอง เรามิเคยได้สู้รบกันมาก่อน และไม่รู้จักกันมาก่อน แต่หากท่านต้องการให้ข้าช่วยอะไรในภายภาคหน้า กรุณาบอกข้าได้เลย

column2: Okay.

column2: Dice
Get out, I'm not in the mood right now.
You look like a newbie to dice, do you want me to explain the rules to you, so you don't lose everything.
Listen to her explain the rules of the dice
Don't want to listen to the introduction
Could it be that I was wrong, are you an old hand at this?
No more playing, you've won all my makeup money.
Each game requires at least 1000 coins, hurry up if you want to join!
Put up 1000 coins to join the game! (Coin 1000 Coin)
Let me think about it.
I absolutely can't touch this thing again, otherwise I'll really lose everything.
Oh my, when can I spend all this makeup money I've saved up.
That's enough for today, let's call it a day.
Oh, you're backing down? I thought you'd be more impressive.
Go away, I'm not playing anymore, if I keep playing, I'll have to pay in.
Hey
Ha
Break!
What a great kung fu!
column3: วรยุทธร้ายกาจ!

column2: I didn't expect you to have martial arts skills, and you're not bad!
I'm just a country bumpkin, I'm sorry for my poor performance.
I once received a few moves from a great hero, but I'm probably too stupid to get the hang of it. If you could give me some pointers, I would be very grateful.
Sure, we'll just touch on the basics.
Ah, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, it was my carelessness that hurt you, I'll go find some healing medicine for you right away.
(This little inn really is a hidden dragon and crouching tiger)
A minor external injury is nothing, we are having a private discussion here, no one is allowed to leak it out.
Sure, sure.
I see, so this is how this move should be used!
Little Lame thanks you for your guidance.
It's just a small effort, no need for such a big ceremony.

It's a small effort for you, but for me it's a life-saving grace. As long as my skills improve, I can not only protect myself in the chaotic world, but also protect the Innkeeper, which is my greatest wish!

When I fled to the Western Regions, I got lost in the desert and was about to starve to death. It was the Innkeeper who saved my life and treated my broken leg. My life belongs to the Innkeeper, and I can do anything for the Innkeeper.
You are truly loyal to the Innkeeper.
It's you! I was just worrying about not having a chance, but you delivered yourself to my doorstep.
It seems you have a lot of resentment towards me.
Offending me is nothing, but if you offend the Innkeeper, you only have one way to die!
Dare to fight with me, without weighing your own strength, you just lost your life in vain.
Running errands to deliver meals
Deliver meals
Deliver meals to Ren Zhongheng and the guests on the second floor.
You're the only one in the kitchen, and now there are so many guests, can you handle it all by yourself?
column3: มีเจ้าคนเดียวในครัว แต่แขกมากมายขนาดนี้ เจ้าจะรับมือคนเดียวไหวรึ?

column2: I'm used to it, it's not busy for more than a few times a year.
column3: ข้าชินแล้วท่าน แถมเวลายุ่งๆก็แค่ไม่กี่ครั้งในรอบปีเท่านั้น

column2: But the guests this time are all unusual, none of them are easy to provoke, I don't want to cause trouble for the Innkeeper, so I have to work day and night.
column3: แต่แขกในคราวนี้ไม่ธรรมดาเลย พวกนั้นของขึ้นง่ายมาก ข้าไม่อยากทำให้ท่านเถ้าแก่เนี้ยมีปัญหา ข้าเลยต้องทำงานหามรุ่งหามค่ำ

column2: But if the cooked food is not delivered quickly, I'm afraid these gentlemen will make trouble; and I really can't get away for a while, I'm just worrying about this.
column3: แต่หากอาหารที่ปรุงเสร็จไม่รีบยกไปให้แขกโดยเร็ว ข้ากลัวว่าพวกคุณท่านเหล่านี้จะก่อปัญหาได้ ข้าคงโดนหาเรื่องสักพักหนึ่งแน่ๆ ข้าเลยกังวลอยู่

column2: What's the difficulty in this, I'll help you deliver it.

column2: You are a distinguished guest of the inn, how can I bother you with this errand.

column2: Anyway, there's nothing to do right now, it's better to find something to do to pass the time.

column2: Thank you very much.

column2: So, please help me deliver the meals to the Xuanwu Envoy on the first floor and the guests on the second floor.

column2: It seems that the meals are not all delivered yet, could you please run another trip.

column2: You've worked hard, this is the meal specially reserved for you.

Looking for death!
You really don't know how to write the word 'death'!
I am {PlayerName}, I came to visit your gang out of admiration.
(Familiar voice)
{PlayerName} is my friend, please let him in.
I'm sorry, it turns out you are a friend of the third master, please come in.
I'm sorry, I haven't heard of this name, you can't enter.
Hmph, a dog of the Holy Fire Sect, get in!
Bah, do you think we're like those greedy guys from the Holy Fire Sect? Keep your dirty money!
This is the headquarters of the Holy Fire Sect, how dare you break in at will!
(What should I do if I want to get in?)
