column2: Turn around and run away
column3: หันกลับแล้วจากไป

column2: Bribe the Guard.<color=#c44b0e>(Scrap silver10两)</color>
You don't know how to live!
The defense of the Holy Fire Sect is nothing more than that, it's no different from paper mache in front of me.
I am {PlayerName}, I came to visit your gang out of admiration.
(Familiar voice)
The kid outside the door has some relationship with me, let him in.
It turns out you are a friend of the Xuanwu Envoy, please forgive us for our lack of vision.\nPlease come in quickly, don't let the Xuanwu Envoy wait anxiously.
What kind of cat or dog, I've never heard of it, get out of here, don't get in the way.
The wind is so strong, it's blinding.
What a coincidence, I'm also blinded.
Finally arrived at the station after a journey full of surprises but no danger!
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, I owe you a great deal for escorting me all the way here. Without you, I might not have made it to Flame City so easily.
As the saying goes, even brothers should settle accounts clearly. Let's calculate how much commission I owe you. I won't shortchange you.
Could it be that because of my outstanding performance, you want to give me an extra bonus? I would be truly undeserving of such a reward.
We originally agreed that your commission would be 100 coins, with 20 coins paid in advance and the remaining 80 coins to be paid upon arrival in Flame City.
That's correct.
You stayed in the number one room of Chang'an Inn, which costs 20 coins. We agreed that this would be deducted from your commission, leaving you with 60 coins.
That's true.
When I hired you, we agreed that you would also protect my little clerk. Now that the poor child has met an untimely end...
I admit that I failed in my duty.
Since you admit it, deducting 30 coins from your commission wouldn't be too much, would it?
I... suppose... not.
As my full-time bodyguard, you took on a part-time job as a clerk for someone else. This is dishonest. I should deduct at least 30 coins!
By your calculations, will I end up owing you money in the end?
Considering that you saved my life in the guest room, I'll give you an extra coin as a reward!
Saving your life is only worth one coin? Your life is really cheap.
After all the calculations, I should pay you a commission of 60 coins.
At least you have a conscience and didn't deduct too much.
After all the calculations, I should pay you a commission of 61 coins.
At least you have a conscience and didn't deduct too much.
After all the calculations, I should pay you a commission of 30 coins.
Your calculations are a bit excessive. I escorted you all the way here and you're only giving me this much?
Weren't you coming here anyway? Escorting me was just on your way. Without my guidance, you might have gotten lost in the vast desert. I haven't even charged you for guiding the way.
You're a complete swindler!
After all the calculations, I should pay you a commission of 31 coins.
Your calculations are a bit excessive. I escorted you all the way here and you're only giving me this much?
Weren't you coming here anyway? Escorting me was just on your way. Without my guidance, you might have gotten lost in the vast desert. I haven't even charged you for guiding the way.
You're a complete swindler!
After all the calculations... it seems I don't have to pay you a single coin.
What did you say? I did all this for nothing?!
Weren't you coming here anyway? Escorting me was just on your way. Without my guidance, you might have gotten lost in the vast desert. If we calculate carefully, you might even owe me money.
You've seen what I'm capable of. Don't make me angry!
This is Cold Skin Gang's territory. If you dare to commit violence in public, you'll be making an enemy of Cold Skin Gang. Think about the consequences.
After all the calculations... it seems I only need to give you one coin!
What did you say? I did all this for almost nothing?!
Weren't you coming here anyway? Escorting me was just on your way. Without my guidance, you might have gotten lost in the vast desert. If we calculate carefully, you might even owe me money.
You've seen what I'm capable of. Don't make me angry!
This is Cold Skin Gang's territory. If you dare to commit violence in public, you'll be making an enemy of Cold Skin Gang. Think about the consequences.

We've known each other for a while now. Considering that you once saved my life, I have a secret recipe for making <color=#c44b0e>Thunder bullet</color> here. It's not worth much to me, so I might as well give it to you as a favor.
Alright, our deal ends here. Until we meet again.
Kind sir, could you spare a few coins to save a life?
Donate 10 coins. (<color=#097a76>10 coins</color>)
Donate 100 coins. (<color=#097a76>100 coins</color>)
Give 1000 coins. (<color=#097a76>1000 coins</color>)
Turn around and run away.
column3: หันหลังและจากไป

column2: Can't even afford a few coins, you pauper!
In this day and age, 10 coins can't do anything, please show some mercy.
Well, 100 coins can barely fill the stomach, better than nothing.
You're such a great benefactor, truly a living Bodhisattva who saves the needy.
With so much money, who would continue to be a beggar!
Buy meat, drink wine, I'm going to stay in the most luxurious room~
Is there no ambition? It seems that you can only be a beggar in this life.
The bowl used by the beggar just now was a bit strange...
(Pick up the bowl on the ground and examine it carefully)
Beg...for...decree...
Begging with a royal decree! The bestowed golden bowl!
Such a treasure can be discarded at will, it's scary without coins.
Salamander's Meat
column3: เนื้อซาลาแมนเดอร์

column2: Go to Flame Toad Cave to kill Salamander and get 10 pieces of Salamander's Meat.
Give 10 pieces of Salamander's Meat to the meat-selling Merchant in Flame City.
Young man over there, please stop.
What can I do for you?
column3: เจ้าอยากให้ข้าช่วยอะไรไหม?

column2: Looking at your outfit, I know you are capable, can you help me with a small favor?
Let's hear it.
I heard that a Flame Toad Cave was recently discovered, with many Salamanders inside. Could you please help me get some Salamander's Meat?
What do you want that for, I see you don't lack meat on your stall.
Of course it's for skewers. The skewers made from Salamander's Meat have a unique taste, even without chili, they have a burning sensation, which gives a different flavor when eaten.
How much do you need?
Get ten pieces of Salamander's Meat first, after all, if you get too much and can't sell it, it's a waste.
Okay, I'll come to you when I'm ready.
I've collected enough 10 pieces of Salamander's Meat, I can hand it in now.
Here is the Salamander's Meat you wanted.
I've never seen so much fresh Salamander's Meat, I don't know how long the piece I got last time has been sitting.
Wait a moment, I'll let you taste my cooking on the horse!
A quarter of an hour later...
Here, taste this Salamander Meat Skewer and see how it tastes!
(Smack...smack...)
A wild feeling is constantly stirring deep inside, it's a wonderful experience.
You look unfamiliar, you must have just arrived in Flame City.
Yes, I came from the Central Plains.
The Central Plains is a good place, rich in resources, with fine clothes and jade food, unlike here where there is nothing!
All the merchants who come to the Western Regions from the Central Plains bring some special products from the Central Plains to sell in the Western Regions, earning a hefty profit.
If you have Rare or above liquor on you, I will buy it at a higher price!
You are dressed in fine clothes, although you are dusty, it can't hide the fine workmanship!\nYou must have come from the Central Plains to do business here, right?
You have a good eye, I do come from the Central Plains, but I'm not here to do business, I have other important things to do.
No problem, as long as you have Rare or above Cloth, silk thread, I will buy it at a higher price here!
Only clothes made of top-grade Cloth can sell for a good price, the resources here are scarce, so we can only rely on you merchants who come from afar.
Tea leaf from the Central Plains is said to be worth its weight in gold in the Western Regions, hence many tea merchants risk their lives to trade tea here every year.
Due to the mixed powers in the Western Regions in recent years, even the so-called trade routes have become increasingly unsafe, and many Merchant groups have ended up with no survivors.
Now, Tea leaf is becoming increasingly rare in the Western Regions. If you have a way to get Tea leaf from the Central Plains, regardless of the quality, I am willing to buy it at a high price!
The livestock in the Western Regions have been divided and occupied by various powers, and the stock is running low. If there is no more meat supply, I'm afraid my ancestral craft will be wasted.
Blacksmith's commission
Help Flame CityBlacksmith get 5 pieces of Blood Jewel.
Give 5 pieces of Blood Jewel to Flame CityBlacksmith.
Young man, please hold on!
What's the matter?
column3: มีอะไร?

column2: (Whispering) Do you have something special on you, young man?
I have many special things on me, which one are you referring to?
(Whispering) Blood... Jewel...
How do you know I have Blood Jewel on me?
(Whispering) Be careful with your words, you're speaking so loudly, aren't you afraid that others will hear and covet the Blood Jewel on you?
I used to be hired by the Cold Skin Gang to mine Blood Jewel. Later, the Master ordered to stop mining Blood Jewel, so I had to find another way to make a living.
So, I'm very familiar with the unique smell of Blood Jewel.
Nowadays, Blood Jewel is very rare in the market. Although I don't know how you got it, I guess you must have a way to get more Blood Jewel.
As long as you help me get 5 pieces of Blood Jewel, I will tell you a method that can make the Blood Jewel effective continuously, instead of being a short-term consumable.
I have collected enough Blood Jewel for Blacksmith. I want to see what his permanent solution is.
Here are 5 pieces of Blood Jewel, I brought them for you, now let me see your so-called permanent solution.
Hehe, watch closely!
One shichen later...
(Shows you something)
What is this?
This is a Blood Jewel Pendant I made. You can wear it as an accessory and have a similar effect to using Blood Jewel.
This is very useful to me, thank you!
(Takes back the pendant quickly)
I didn't say I would give it to you, I just told you I have this skill, so I didn't break my promise. Besides, you've learned how to make it, so make one yourself if you want.
This is the forbidden area of the Cold Skin Gang, no one is allowed to enter without the Master's order!
column3: นี่คือพื้นที่ต้องห้ามของพรรคมังสาเหมันต์ ผู้ที่ไม่ได้รับอนุญาตจากนายท่านห้ามมิให้เข้าไป!

column2: (What should I do if I want to get in?)
column3: (ข้าจะทำอย่างไรดี?)

column2: Force my way in! <color=#c44b0e>(Start the fight immediately)</color>
Inform that permission has been granted to enter.
Turn around and run away
column3: หันกลับแล้วจากไป

column2: Looking for death!
You really don't know how to write the word 'death'!
Since the Master has allowed you to enter, please go ahead.
Dare to trespass Flame Sand Cave, kill without mercy!
The more you don't let me in, the more I want to go in, even if the king of heaven comes, he can't stop me!
{PlayerSurName}, can you do me a small favor?
You need something from me?
I ate something bad today, I need to go to the toilet, can you stand guard for me for a shichen?
You need a shichen to go to the toilet?
Well, well... Anyway, I'll definitely be back in a shichen!
(Should I help him?)
Stand guard for him.
Refuse decisively!
It's too late, I can't hold it anymore.
Plop~~
What a bad luck, I almost vomited from the smoke.
Make sure you hold the position until I come back. If I come back and you're not here, we're both in trouble!
Got it, got it.
Should I sneak into the Flame Sand Cave while no one is around?
Sneak into the Flame Sand Cave.
Defender position.
One shichen later...
{PlayerSurName} young hero is indeed credible, not moving an inch!
Since I promised you, I certainly won't break my word.
Player automatically enters Flame Sand Cave
I'd better wait here for the Guard to come back.
You untrustworthy guy, it's okay if you don't stand guard for me, but you sneak into the Flame Sand Cave yourself. If you want to die, don't drag others down!
Get lost, don't let me see you again!
It's just a little run away.
How could you sneak in by yourself? If we were deadly struck by outsiders, our sins would be great!
Fortunately, Master has granted you permission to enter the Flame Sand Cave. There should be no big problem. I was almost scared to death when I saw you were not here.
You really are a coward.
The last guy who deserted his post was whipped by the second master and suffered flesh wounds. I don't want to follow in his footsteps.
Thanks to {PlayerSurName} brother's help in Chang'an Inn that day, Shi Wenxiu recognizes you as a friend!
column3: ต้องขอบคุณความช่วยเหลือของน้องชาย{PlayerSurName} ในโรงเตี๊ยมฉางอันในวันนั้น สือเหวินซิ่วจำท่านได้ในฐานะสหาย!

column2: If you need help in the future, just come to me.
{PlayerSurName}, can you do me a small favor?
What are you looking for me again?
A few nights ago, a man in black with an unknown identity sneaked into the Flame Sand Cave, but was fortunately killed by the elite disciple in the cave.
Those people might come again tonight, I'm just an outer door Disciple with limited abilities, so please protect me in times of crisis.
(Should I help him?)
Accept the request.
Think about it.
Young hero, don't leave. If they really come, I can only die.
With the young hero watching over me, I feel much more secure.
One shichen later...
They're here!
If we can't break into the Flame Sand Cave today, we can't explain to the master. Brothers, let's fight!
You, you promised to protect me...
This time we join forces to eliminate the invaders, we will surely be greatly rewarded by Master. Maybe I have a chance to become the fifth master, and no longer have to guard the cave entrance~
{PlayerSurName} young hero, please stay!
I didn't expect Master to be in retreat here. I disturbed Master, I'll run away now.
Wait, I have made no progress in the key point of studying knife technique. I hope to exchange ideas with {PlayerSurName} young hero, maybe I can find the opportunity to break through.
(Do you agree to Master Huo's request for a discussion?)
Agree to spar with Huo Shilou (solo fight by the protagonist)
Politely decline.
It's a pity.\nHowever, I practice here every night. If the young hero is convenient, you can come and compete with me at any time.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, would you like to spar with me?
There is no sign of breakthrough yet, this may not be achieved in a day.\nI practice here every night. If the young hero is convenient, you can come and compete with me at any time.
I see!
Finally, a great success!
Thank you, {PlayerSurName} young hero, for helping me break through the bottleneck!
Young hero is also a master of knife practice. I have a manual here, which may help you improve your knife technique!

Huo is not proficient in the martial arts that the young hero has learned. Only the few books of practice experience written by Huo himself may be of some use. Today, they are given to the young hero.
This is the forbidden area of the Cold Skin Gang, outsiders are not allowed to enter without permission!
column3: นี่คือพื้นที่ต้องห้ามของพรรคมังสาเหมันต์ ผู้ที่ไม่ได้รับอนุญาตจากนายท่านห้ามมิให้เข้าไป!

column2: I'm already here, what can you do to me?
{yell}, intruder, die!
The Cold Skin Gang Master is nothing more than this.
Stay in the hotel. <color=#097a76>(400 Coin)</color>
Stay in the hotel again. <color=#097a76>(400 Coin)</color>
Charge you 400 Coin!\nYou can use the Guest Room on the second floor of this shop for six shichen.
If you want to continue using the Guest Room of this shop, you can pay another 400 Coin now, and you can continue to use it for six shichen.
Alright, then I'll go down first!
Alright, then let's go down together!
Deep Hatred
Revenge
Kill Gu Qing Yang to avenge Haitang Qiu.
Tell Haitang Qiu about the death of Gu Qing Yang.
Good sister, you have lost weight since I last saw you.
Sister Feng, why are you here?\nLong time no see, let me cook for you and let you taste my cooking skills.
Don't you have a lot of trouble to deal with in the Sacred Fire Sect?
There's no need to worry now, with the deputy sect master to help me, I can rest easy.
Deputy sect master?
Far in the sky and close in front of you, it's the young hero in front of you~
{PlayerSurName} Young hero? Is he now the deputy sect master of your Sacred Fire Sect?
His status is much higher than mine now, even helping you achieve your wish is a piece of cake.
I, Haitang Qiu, have a request.
Innkeeper Haitang, please get up, what can I help you with?
I have a sworn enemy, please, {PlayerSurName} young hero, help me seek justice.
Who is your enemy?
Gu Qing Yang, the Qinglong Envoy of the Sacred Fire Sect!
How could it be him? Why did you have a grudge before?
I was adopted by my adoptive father since I was a child. This Chang'an Inn is the result of my adoptive father's many years of hard work. I was barely raised by the meager income of the inn.

One year, Gu Qing Yang came to the inn to arrest people. The person who was arrested happened to be a good friend of my adoptive father. My adoptive father did not want to betray his friend, so he died under the torture of Gu Qing Yang.
At that time, I was hiding in the woodpile and witnessed all this. It was the most unforgettable scene in my life.

Gu Qing Yang was going to search the inn further. In order not to expose me, my adoptive father's friend, who was angry at my adoptive father's death, stood up and led Gu Qing Yang away. His whereabouts are unknown.
Later, I changed my face and appeared in a new identity, claiming to be the new Innkeeper of this inn. The purpose is to meet heroes with high abilities one day to avenge my adoptive father.
I didn't expect Gu Qing Yang to have such a blood debt. Don't worry, I'll do this for you!
If I can really avenge my adoptive father, I will definitely repay the young hero in this life.
(It's not easy to kill Gu Qing Yang under the public eye. Should I lure him to a secluded place before making a move?)
Lure Gu Qing Yang to another place.
Don't make a move for now.
What can I do for you, Deputy Sect Master?
Indeed, there is a matter that requires the personal attention of the Azure Dragon Envoy. It's a secret matter, let's discuss it in a secluded place.
What kind of matter requires such secrecy?
You'll know soon.
Can the Vice Sect Leader speak now?
I need to borrow something from the Azure Dragon Envoy.
What do you need to borrow?
The head of the Azure Dragon Envoy.
Vice Sect Leader, are you joking?
Do you think I'm joking?
If you want to take my life, it won't be that easy!
Do you know why I want to take your life?
The Holy Fire Sect has many enemies, who sent you?
Chang'an Inn, a life for a life!
You are...
Gu Qing Yang is dead, now you can tell Haitang Qiu the news.
You tell Haitang Qiu about Gu Qing Yang's death, Haitang Qiu is overjoyed, she takes out her adoptive father's tablet from her bedroom and kneels down to worship with tears.
The deep hatred has been avenged, I have nothing to stay for here...
If one day you want to run away to the Western Regions, you can take me with you. I've said that I want to repay you in this life.
My inn is getting colder and colder, if I don't find an opportunity to cook, my cooking skills will get rusty.
You're lucky, I'll cook today to practice my skills, you wait for me there, I'll be back soon.

Haitang Qiu personally cooks a table of food and brings out the few bottles of wine left in the shop for you to enjoy a feast.\nAfter three rounds of wine, Haitang Qiu's expression becomes more and more gloomy, she silently walks to your side and kneels down...
(It's not easy to kill Gu Qing Yang under the public eye. Should I lure him to a secluded place before making a move?)
What do you need from me?
I have a confidential matter, I would like to ask the Azure Dragon Envoy to discuss it in a secluded place.
Is it business or personal?
If it's business, it can be announced in public, no need to avoid people; if it's personal, my relations with you have not yet reached the point of discussing personal matters.
(Improve your relations with him, and there may be a chance for change.)
What can I do for you, {PlayerSurName} brother?
column3: เจ้าอยากให้ข้าช่วยอะไรไหม? พี่{PlayerSurName}

column2: I have a confidential matter, I would like to ask the Azure Dragon Envoy to discuss it in a secluded place.
What kind of matter requires such secrecy?
You'll know soon.
Can you talk now?
I need to borrow something from the Azure Dragon Envoy.
What do you need to borrow?
The head of the Azure Dragon Envoy.
Are you joking?
Do you think I'm joking?
If you want to take my life, it won't be that easy!
Do you know why I want to take your life?
The Holy Fire Sect has many enemies, who sent you?
Chang'an Inn, a life for a life!
You are...
There seems to be inscriptions on this stone tablet...
(Wipe off the dust on the stone tablet)
This, this is the record of the construction of the treasure by the king of the God Cow Kingdom, and...
The ultimate treasure's method of opening!!!
Who would have thought that the most valuable treasure everyone was fighting for is here.
Let me see how to open it...
Mission accomplished!
What is this coin word on it? It's like a ghost symbol, I can't understand it at all.
Could it be that my understanding of coin words is not enough, or is this a special coin word in the Western Regions?
I'll have to try again when I have the chance.
The machinery is already cracked, there's nothing to see.
The two giants of the Western Regions, the Cold Skin Gang and the Holy Fire Sect, who have been dominating for more than a decade,
have been fighting for more than a decade without a clear winner. However, no one expected that
you would sweep the Western Regions with your own strength, and the two major forces would be destroyed one after another,
For a time, all the forces in the Western Regions heard your name and were all in fear.
Your ambition is not to dominate the Western Regions, there are still many unfinished things in the Central Plains,
It's time to prepare for the journey home.
{yell} People from the Holy Fire Sect must also follow the rules here!
Rules? I, Gu Qing Yang, am the rule!
Azure Dragon Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect, Gu Qing Yang!!!
Hmph!
Uh!
The Azure Dragon Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect, what is he doing here at the Cold Skin Gang?
Huo Da Dangjia, please hand over the treasure map in your hand, so as not to hurt our friendship.
Does the Holy Fire Sect want to rob us openly? Do you think you can do whatever you want here at the Cold Skin Gang?
Huo Da Dangjia, calm down, let me show you something.
(Hand Huo Shilou something)
This, this is...
What's wrong with Da Dangjia?
This is a strand of hair from Brother Zi Tian!
{yell}What have you done to Brother Zi Tian?
Brother Zi Tian is fine, but whether he can continue to live depends on whether the leader cooperates.
I, Huo, must see Brother Zi Tian safe and sound before I can give you the Treasure map.
Since you don't trust the Holy Fire Sect, then it's up to you. When you figure out the pros and cons, come find us.
Wait, take the Treasure map and bring Brother Zi Tian back as soon as possible.
If Brother Zi Tian is missing a single hair, my Cold Skin Gang will never stop fighting with the Holy Fire Sect!
(Take the Treasure map given by Huo Shilou)
I, Gu, will take my leave.
Leader Huo, please hand over the ten Blood Jewels treasured by your gang, so as to avoid any unpleasantness.
Does the Holy Fire Sect want to rob us openly? Do you think you can do whatever you want here at the Cold Skin Gang?
Huo Da Dangjia, calm down, let me show you something.
(Hand Huo Shilou something)

(Take the Blood Jewel given by Huo Shilou)
I, Gu, will take my leave.
{yell} People from the Holy Fire Sect must also follow the rules here!
Rules? We, the Holy Fire Sect, are the rules!
Looking for death!
(A voice of authority and depth)
Let the people from the Holy Fire Sect come in.
Yes, leader!
What is the Holy Fire Sect doing in the Cold Skin Gang?
Huo Da Dangjia, please hand over the treasure map in your hand, so as not to hurt our friendship.
Does the Holy Fire Sect want to rob us openly? Do you think you can do whatever you want here at the Cold Skin Gang?

I will take my leave.

Since you don't trust the Holy Fire Sect, then it's up to you. When you figure out the pros and cons, come find us.

If Brother Zi Tian is missing a single hair, my Cold Skin Gang will never stop fighting with the Holy Fire Sect!
(Take the Blood Jewel given by Huo Shilou)
I will take my leave.
{PlayerSurName}You are talented and have made great contributions to the Cold Skin Gang. It would be a waste of your talent to make you the fifth leader of the Cold Skin Gang.
I, Huo, decide to hire {PlayerSurName} as a guest of my Cold Skin Gang. Below me, you can command the brothers in the gang.
To show my sincerity, I will give you my lifelong unique skill as a gift.
Thank you for your promotion, leader.
The young hero has reached the top of the heavenly rank at a young age, which is rare, but not necessarily valuable.
column3: จอมยุทธ์น้อยได้ขึ้นถึงผู้นำระดับสวรรค์ตั้งแต่อายุยังน้อย ซึ่งเป็นสิ่งเรื่องที่ทำหายาก แต่ก็ไม่ใช่ว่าจะมีคุณค่าเสมอไป

column2: If the young hero is still not satisfied, you can go to the Wuyue Region. There is a <color=#c44b0e>Sky Breaker Tower</color> there, which is full of masters. If you can stand out among them, that would be truly amazing!
column3: หากจอมยุทธ์น้อยยังไม่พอใจ ท่านสามารถไปที่เขตหวู่เยว่ได้ มี <color=#c44b0e>หอสูงเทียมฟ้า</color> ที่นั่นมีปรมาจารย์มากมาย หากท่านสามารถโดดเด่นในหมู่ปรมาจารย์ได้ จะน่าทึ่งมากจริงๆ!

column2: Are you also here to experience this Sky Breaker Tower? Not everyone can climb this tower.
column3: จอมยุทธ์น้อย เจ้ามาที่นี่เพื่อสัมผัสประสบการณ์หอสูงเทียมฟ้าแห่งนี้ด้วยหรือ? ไม่ใช่ทุกคนที่จะปีนหอสูงเทียมฟ้านี้ได้

column2: I am {PlayerName}, I wonder if I am qualified to climb the tower?
column3: ข้าคือ{PlayerName} ข้าสงสัยว่าข้ามีคุณสมบัติพอที่จะปีนหอคอยนี้หรือไม่?

column2: So it's the youngest heavenly rank leader, {PlayerSurName}. Of course, you are qualified to climb the tower. I am the owner of the Sky Breaker Tower. This tower has an extraordinary origin. Would {PlayerSurName} be interested in hearing me introduce it?
column3: เจ้าคือผู้นำระดับสวรรค์จอมยุทธ์ที่อายุน้อยที่สุด{PlayerSurName} แน่นอนที่สุด เจ้ามีคุณสมบัติที่จะปีนหอสูงเทียมฟ้าได้ ข้าเป็นเจ้าของหอสูงเทียมฟ้านี้ หอคอยนี้มีต้นกำเนิดที่ไม่ธรรมดา จอมยุทธ์น้อย{PlayerSurName}เจ้าสนใจที่จะฟังคำชี้แนะของข้าไหม?

column2: I'm all ears.
column3: ข้าฟังอยู่

column2: Not interested.
column3: ไม่สนใจ

column2: In that case, please climb the tower, {PlayerSurName}.
column3: ถ้าเช่นนั้น ก็ขอเชิญปีนขึ้นบนหอคอยได้ {PlayerSurName}

column2: This Sky Breaker Tower was built in imitation of the Heavenly Pagoda of the Martial Emperor era, and it houses countless martial arts masters.
column3: หอสูงเทียมฟ้าแห่งนี้ถูกสร้างขึ้นเลียนแบบเจดีย์สวรรค์แห่งสมัยจักรพรรดิ์นักรบ และถือเป็นที่พำนักของปรมาจารย์ยุทธ์จำนวนนับไม่ถ้วน

column2: These Vagabonds are obsessed with Martial Arts, they don't want to show their true faces, they like to imitate famous people in the martial arts world and spar with others. If they lose in the competition, they won't lose face.
column3: ผู้พเนจรเหล่านี้หมกมุ่นอยู่กับวิทยายุทธ พวกเขาไม่ต้องการเปิดเผยใบหน้าที่แท้จริงของพวกเขา พวกเขาชอบที่จะเลียนแบบผู้มีชื่อเสียงในยุทธภพและทะเลาะวิวาทกับผู้อื่น หากพวกเขาแพ้ในการแข่งขัน พวกเขาจะได้ไม่เสียหน้า

column2: The purpose of my building this Sky Breaker Tower is to gather martial arts masters for my own use, and also to provide an opportunity for newcomers in the martial arts world to hone themselves.
column3: จุดประสงค์ของการสร้างหอสูงเทียมฟ้าของข้า คือเพื่อรวบรวมเหล่าปรมาจารย์ยุทธ์ไว้เพื่อการใช้งานของข้าเอง และยังเปิดโอกาสให้คนรุ่นใหม่ในยุทธภพได้มาฝึกฝนตนเองด้วย

column2: There are also many treasures hidden in the Sky Breaker Tower that are not easily seen outside. You can come to me to exchange them based on your own strength.
column3: นอกจากนี้ในหอสูงเทียมฟ้ายังมีสมบัติมากมายซ่อนอยู่ ซึ่งหาชมได้ยากจากภายนอก เจ้าสามารถมาหาข้าเพื่อแลกเปลี่ยนได้ตามความแข็งแกร่งของตัวเจ้าเอง

column2: Since it's your first time in the Sky Breaker Tower, I'll give you a brief introduction to the rules here.
column3: ในเมื่อนี่เป็นครั้งแรกที่เจ้าจะเข้าไปยังหอสูงเทียมฟ้า ข้าจะแนะนำกฎเกณฑ์โดยย่อที่นี่

column2: Experiencing it yourself is always better than any introduction. Why not try climbing the tower yourself?
column3: การได้สัมผัสมันด้วยตัวเองย่อมดีกว่าฟังคำชี้แนะใดๆ ทำไมเจ้าไม่ลองปีนหอคอยด้วยตัวเองดูล่ะ?

column2: Flame Toad
column3: คางคกอัคคี

column2: Mission
column3: ภารกิจ

column2: Head to Flame Toad Cave and capture or eliminate the Flame Toad.
column3: มุ่งหน้าไปยังถ้ำคางคกอัคคีแล้วจับหรือกำจัดคางคกอัคคี

column2: I am willing to serve the sect leader, is there any task that needs to be done recently?
column3: ข้าเต็มใจรับใช้ผู้นำนิกาย มีภารกิจใดให้ข้าต้องเร่งทำโดยเร็วหรือไม่?

column2: There's nothing that needs your help these days, young hero {PlayerSurName}.
column3: จอมยุทธ์น้อย{PlayerSurName} ทุกวันนี้ ไม่มีอะไรที่ต้องการความช่วยเหลือจากเจ้าแล้ว

column2: (From the way he speaks, it seems like he's not being sincere. Could it be that my relations with the Holy Fire Sect are not good enough, and he's unwilling to trust outsiders easily?)
column3: (จากวิธีการพูดของเขา ดูเหมือนว่าเขาจะไม่ได้หมายความอย่างที่พูด เป็นไปได้ไหมที่ความสัมพันธ์ของข้ากับนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์นั้นยังไม่ดีพอ และเขาไม่เต็มใจที่จะเชื่อใจคนนอกอย่างข้าได้?)

column2: Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you've come at the right time. There is indeed a task that only you can undertake.
column3: จอมยุทธ์น้อย{PlayerSurName} เจ้ามาถูกเวลาแล้ว ข้ามีภารกิจที่มีเพียงเจ้าเท่านั้นที่ทำได้

column2: Please give your orders, sect leader.
column3: ท่านผู้นำนิกาย กรุณาออกสั่งมาได้เลย

column2: The Holy Fire Sect's sworn enemy, the Cold Skin Gang, is planning to go to Flame Toad Cave to capture the Flame Toad as a training aid.
column3: พรรคมังสาเหมันต์ศัตรูคู่อาฆาตของนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ กำลังวางแผนที่จะไปที่ถ้ำคางคกอัคคี เพื่อจับคางคกอัคคี ไว้เป็นเครื่องช่วยฝึกฝน

column2: If their skills improve and ours decline, the Holy Fire Sect will be overshadowed by the Cold Skin Gang. I absolutely will not allow this to happen!
column3: หากฝีมือของพวกเขารุดหน้าขึ้นและเราถดถอยลง นิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์คงต้องอยู่ภายใต้เงาของพรรคมังสาเหมันต์แล้ว ข้าจะไม่ยอมให้สิ่งนี้เกิดขึ้นโดยเด็ดขาด!

column2: I order you to capture or eliminate the Flame Toad before the Cold Skin Gang, to thwart their plans and prevent them from using it to aid their training.
column3: ข้าขอสั่งให้เจ้าไปจับหรือกำจัดคางคกอัคคีก่อนพรรคมังสาเหมันต์ซะ เพื่อขัดขวางแผนการของพวกมัน และป้องกันไม่ให้พวกมันใช้เป็นเครื่องมือช่วยในการฝึกฝน

column2: Yes!
column3: รับทราบ!

column2: Leave the Flame Toad!
column3: ทิ้งคางคกอัคคีไว้!

column2: This Flame Toad is of great use to our Cold Skin Gang, please be generous and let us have it.
column3: คางคกอัคคีนี้มีประโยชน์อย่างมากกับพรรคมังสาเหมันต์ของเรา โปรดแสดงน้ำใจและให้เราได้นำมันไป?

column2: I quite like this toad, I don't want to give it to anyone else.
column3: ข้ารู้สึกชอบพอคางคกตัวนี้มาก ข้าไม่อยากมอบมันให้กับผู้ใด

column2: We need this Flame Toad, if you're not willing to let it go, we'll have to offend you!
column3: พวกเราต้องการคางคกอัคคีนี้ หากเจ้าไม่เต็มใจที่จะวางมือจากมัน เห็นที่เราจะต้องใช้กำลังกับเจ้า!

column2: Quickly report to the leader, the situation has changed, the Flame Toad has been stolen!
column3: รีบรายไปงานหัวหน้าด่วน สถานการณ์เปลี่ยนแล้ว คางคกอัคคีถูกขโมยไป!

column2: Trying to double-cross me? You're still too green.
I was too late, the Flame Toad has been killed!
column3: ช้าเกินไปหนึ่งก้าว คางคกอัคคีถูกสังหารไปแล้ว!

column2: This Flame Toad was of great use to our Cold Skin Gang, why did you kill it?
column3: คางคกอัคคีนี้มีประโยชน์อย่างมากกับพรรคมังสาเหมันต์ของเรา ทำไมเจ้าถึงสังหารมันทิ้งล่ะ?

column2: Whether it's useful to you or not is none of my business. It was ownerless, so I killed it. What can you do about it?
You messed up the Cold Skin Gang's plan, and you're still smiling, you're asking for a beating!
Quickly report to the leader, the situation has changed, the Flame Toad has been killed!
column3: รีบรายไปงานหัวหน้าด่วน สถานการณ์เปลี่ยนแล้ว คางคกอัคคีถูกสังหารไปแล้ว!

column2: Trying to double-cross me? You're still too green.
The Holy Fire Sect's main hall is not a place you can enter as you please, {yell}!
There's no place in this world that I, Shura Master, cannot go.
Shura Master? We thought you were a fugitive.
Get lost, or I won't be polite!
Insignificant ants!
This Shura Master is so arrogant, I wonder what he's doing at the Holy Fire Sect.
So the Old Man who gave me directions was Shura Master, I wonder what he's doing at the Holy Fire Sect.
Fang Xiaoian, I've brought the thing you were looking for. Have you prepared the things for Chai Wang?
Ten boxes of Exploding Thunder Bullets have been prepared and can be sent to Chai Wang at any time.
Chai Wang asked when you will be able to unify the Western Regions? Your progress is a bit slow.
The Cold Skin Gang has been meddling, and they've got the help of the Blood Jewel, so we've been at a stalemate for years.
I'll teach you a method, use this opportunity of the Divine Ox Treasury to solve the problem once and for all.
What method?

Publicize the news of the Divine Ox Treasury and let all the forces fight for it. The Cold Skin Gang will definitely not stand by, we can lure the snake out of the hole and catch them all in one fell swoop!
Great idea! This will save a lot of trouble.
Let me make it clear in advance, Chai Wang wants half of the things in this Divine Ox Treasury!
Our Holy Fire Sect has invested a lot of manpower and resources for this treasure, Chai Wang's appetite seems a bit too big.

After the task is completed, I will teach you the Vedas Scripture. With your Intelligence, if you can combine the techniques of the scripture with your Holy Fire Skill, it will definitely help you break through the bottleneck and improve your skills rapidly!
If that's the case, I, as the sect leader, will personally ride a Horse to assist King Chai in obtaining the Divine Ox Treasury.
When you are ready to reveal the Divine Ox Treasury, don't forget to inform me.

Five days later, the Holy Fire Sect publicly displayed the Divine Ox Treasury Treasure map, clearly marking the location of the Divine Ox Treasury. The treasure that had been buried for a hundred years finally reappeared.
Fang Xiaoian really revealed the Divine Ox Treasury, but it's unknown who will end up with this treasure.

{PlayerName}, you have contributed a lot to the Holy Fire Sect for a long time, and your loyalty is commendable. I value talents and plan to invite you to be the deputy leader of the Holy Fire Sect. What do you think?
Agree to be the deputy leader of the Holy Fire Sect.
Recommend Gu Qing Yang.
Politely decline.
Since you are not interested, I won't force you.\nHowever, since you can't be used by me, I can't let you help others...
What does Sect Leader Fang mean?
Is Sect Leader Fang trying to kill me?
